contents.text: WTP Count: The number of WTPs currently connected to the interface, with a maximum value of 65535.
contents.zh-CHS: WTP计数：当前连接到接口的WTP数，最大值为65535。

contents.text: 4.6.10. CAPWAP Control IPv6 Address
contents.zh-CHS: 4.6.10. CAPWAP控制IPv6地址

contents.text: The CAPWAP Control IPv6 Address message element is sent by the AC to the WTP during the Discovery process and is used by the AC to provide the interfaces available on the AC, and the current number of WTPs connected. This message element is useful for the WTP to perform load balancing across multiple interfaces (see Section 6.1).
contents.zh-CHS: CAPWAP控制IPv6地址消息元素在发现过程中由AC发送到WTP，AC使用该元素提供AC上可用的接口以及当前连接的WTP数量。此消息元素有助于WTP跨多个接口执行负载平衡（参见第6.1节）。

contents.text: Type: 11 for CAPWAP Control IPv6 Address
contents.zh-CHS: 类型：11表示CAPWAP控制IPv6地址

contents.text: Length: 18
contents.zh-CHS: 长度：18

contents.text: IP Address: The IP address of an interface.
contents.zh-CHS: IP地址：接口的IP地址。

contents.text: WTP Count: The number of WTPs currently connected to the interface, with a maximum value of 65535.
contents.zh-CHS: WTP计数：当前连接到接口的WTP数，最大值为65535。

contents.text: 4.6.11. CAPWAP Local IPv4 Address
contents.zh-CHS: 4.6.11. CAPWAP本地IPv4地址

contents.text: The CAPWAP Local IPv4 Address message element is sent by either the WTP, in the Join Request, or by the AC, in the Join Response. The CAPWAP Local IPv4 Address message element is used to communicate the IP Address of the transmitter. The receiver uses this to determine whether a middlebox exists between the two peers, by comparing the source IP address of the packet against the value of the message element.
contents.zh-CHS: CAPWAP本地IPv4地址消息元素由WTP在加入请求中发送，或由AC在加入响应中发送。CAPWAP本地IPv4地址消息元素用于传输发射机的IP地址。接收方通过将数据包的源IP地址与消息元素的值进行比较来确定两个对等方之间是否存在中间盒。

contents.text: Type: 30 for CAPWAP Local IPv4 Address
contents.zh-CHS: 类型：30表示CAPWAP本地IPv4地址

contents.text: Length: 4
contents.zh-CHS: 长度：4

contents.text: IP Address: The IP address of the sender.
contents.zh-CHS: IP地址：发送方的IP地址。

contents.text: 4.6.12. CAPWAP Local IPv6 Address
contents.zh-CHS: 4.6.12. CAPWAP本地IPv6地址

contents.text: The CAPWAP Local IPv6 Address message element is sent by either the WTP, in the Join Request, or by the AC, in the Join Response. The CAPWAP Local IPv6 Address message element is used to communicate the IP Address of the transmitter. The receiver uses this to determine whether a middlebox exists between the two peers, by comparing the source IP address of the packet against the value of the message element.
contents.zh-CHS: CAPWAP本地IPv6地址消息元素由WTP在加入请求中发送，或由AC在加入响应中发送。CAPWAP本地IPv6地址消息元素用于传送发射机的IP地址。接收方通过将数据包的源IP地址与消息元素的值进行比较来确定两个对等方之间是否存在中间盒。

contents.text: Type: 50 for CAPWAP Local IPv6 Address
contents.zh-CHS: 类型：50表示CAPWAP本地IPv6地址

contents.text: Length: 16
contents.zh-CHS: 长度：16

contents.text: IP Address: The IP address of the sender.
contents.zh-CHS: IP地址：发送方的IP地址。

contents.text: 4.6.13. CAPWAP Timers
contents.zh-CHS: 4.6.13. CAPWAP定时器

contents.text: The CAPWAP Timers message element is used by an AC to configure CAPWAP timers on a WTP.
contents.zh-CHS: AC使用CAPWAP定时器消息元素在WTP上配置CAPWAP定时器。

contents.text: Type: 12 for CAPWAP Timers
contents.zh-CHS: 类型：12用于CAPWAP定时器

contents.text: Length: 2
contents.zh-CHS: 长度：2

contents.text: Discovery: The number of seconds between CAPWAP Discovery messages, when the WTP is in the Discovery phase. This value is used to configure the MaxDiscoveryInterval timer (see Section 4.7.10).
contents.zh-CHS: 发现：当WTP处于发现阶段时，CAPWAP发现消息之间的秒数。该值用于配置MaxDiscoveryInterval定时器（见第4.7.10节）。

contents.text: Echo Request: The number of seconds between WTP Echo Request CAPWAP messages. This value is used to configure the EchoInterval timer (see Section 4.7.7). The AC sets its EchoInterval timer to this value, plus the maximum retransmission time as described in Section 4.5.3.
contents.zh-CHS: Echo Request：WTP Echo Request CAPWAP消息之间的秒数。该值用于配置EchoInterval定时器（见第4.7.7节）。AC将其EchoInterval定时器设置为该值，加上第4.5.3节所述的最大重传时间。

contents.text: 4.6.14. CAPWAP Transport Protocol
contents.zh-CHS: 4.6.14. CAPWAP传输协议

contents.text: When CAPWAP is run over IPv6, the UDP-Lite or UDP transports MAY be used (see Section 3). The CAPWAP IPv6 Transport Protocol message element is used by either the WTP or the AC to signal which transport protocol is to be used for the CAPWAP data channel.
contents.zh-CHS: 当CAPWAP通过IPv6运行时，可以使用UDP Lite或UDP传输（参见第3节）。WTP或AC使用CAPWAP IPv6传输协议消息元素来表示CAPWAP数据通道将使用哪个传输协议。

contents.text: Upon receiving the Join Request, the AC MAY set the CAPWAP Transport Protocol to UDP-Lite in the Join Response message if the CAPWAP message was received over IPv6, and the CAPWAP Local IPv6 Address message element (see Section 4.6.12) is present and no middlebox was detected (see Section 11).
contents.zh-CHS: 收到加入请求后，如果通过IPv6接收到CAPWAP消息，且存在CAPWAP本地IPv6地址消息元素（参见第4.6.12节）且未检测到任何中间盒（参见第11节），则AC可在加入响应消息中将CAPWAP传输协议设置为UDP Lite。

contents.text: Upon receiving the Join Response, the WTP MAY set the CAPWAP Transport Protocol to UDP-Lite in the Configuration Status Request or Image Data Request message if the AC advertised support for UDP-Lite, the message was received over IPv6, the CAPWAP Local IPv6 Address message element (see Section 4.6.12) and no middlebox was detected (see Section 11). Upon receiving either the Configuration Status Request or the Image Data Request, the AC MUST observe the preference indicated by the WTP in the CAPWAP Transport Protocol, as long as it is consistent with what the AC advertised in the Join Response.
contents.zh-CHS: 收到加入响应后，WTP可在配置状态请求或图像数据请求消息中将CAPWAP传输协议设置为UDP Lite，前提是AC公布的对UDP Lite的支持，该消息是通过IPv6、CAPWAP本地IPv6地址消息元素（参见第4.6.12节）接收的，并且未检测到任何中间盒（参见第11节）. 收到配置状态请求或图像数据请求后，AC必须遵守CAPWAP传输协议中WTP指示的首选项，只要它与AC在加入响应中公布的内容一致。

contents.text: For any other condition, the CAPWAP Transport Protocol MUST be set to UDP.
contents.zh-CHS: 对于任何其他情况，CAPWAP传输协议必须设置为UDP。

contents.text: Type: 51 for CAPWAP Transport Protocol
contents.zh-CHS: 类型：51用于CAPWAP传输协议

contents.text: Length: 1
contents.zh-CHS: 长度：1

contents.text: Transport: The transport to use for the CAPWAP Data channel. The following enumerated values are supported:
contents.zh-CHS: 传输：用于CAPWAP数据通道的传输。支持以下枚举值：

contents.text: 1 - UDP-Lite: The UDP-Lite transport protocol is to be used for the CAPWAP Data channel. Note that this option MUST NOT be used if the CAPWAP Control channel is being used over IPv4.
contents.zh-CHS: 1-UDP Lite：UDP Lite传输协议将用于CAPWAP数据通道。请注意，如果通过IPv4使用CAPWAP控制通道，则不得使用此选项。

contents.text: 2 - UDP: The UDP transport protocol is to be used for the CAPWAP Data channel.
contents.zh-CHS: 2-UDP：UDP传输协议将用于CAPWAP数据通道。

contents.text: 4.6.15. Data Transfer Data
contents.zh-CHS: 4.6.15. 数据传输数据

contents.text: The Data Transfer Data message element is used by the WTP to provide information to the AC for debugging purposes.
contents.zh-CHS: WTP使用数据传输数据消息元素向AC提供信息，以便进行调试。

contents.text: Type: 13 for Data Transfer Data
contents.zh-CHS: 类型：13用于数据传输数据

contents.text: Length:   >= 5
Data Type: An 8-bit value representing the transfer Data Type. The following enumerated values are supported:
contents.zh-CHS: 数据类型：表示传输数据类型的8位值。支持以下枚举值：

contents.text: 1 - Transfer data is included.
contents.zh-CHS: 1-包括传输数据。

contents.text: 2 - Last Transfer Data Block is included (End of File (EOF)).
contents.zh-CHS: 2-包括最后一个传输数据块（文件末尾（EOF））。

contents.text: 5 - An error occurred. Transfer is aborted.
contents.zh-CHS: 5-发生错误。传输被中止。

contents.text: Data Mode: An 8-bit value describing the type of information being transmitted. The following enumerated values are supported:
contents.zh-CHS: 数据模式：描述传输信息类型的8位值。支持以下枚举值：

contents.text: 0 - Reserved
contents.zh-CHS: 0-保留

contents.text: 1 - WTP Crash Data
contents.zh-CHS: 1-WTP碰撞数据

contents.text: 2 - WTP Memory Dump
contents.zh-CHS: 2-WTP内存转储

contents.text: Data Length: Length of data field, with a maximum size of 65535.
contents.zh-CHS: 数据长度：数据字段的长度，最大为65535。

contents.text: Data: Data being transferred from the WTP to the AC, whose type is identified via the Data Mode field.
contents.zh-CHS: 数据：从WTP传输到AC的数据，其类型通过数据模式字段标识。

contents.text: 4.6.16. Data Transfer Mode
contents.zh-CHS: 4.6.16. 数据传输模式

contents.text: The Data Transfer Mode message element is used by the WTP to indicate the type of data transfer information it is sending to the AC for debugging purposes.
contents.zh-CHS: WTP使用数据传输模式消息元素指示其发送给AC的数据传输信息的类型，以便进行调试。

contents.text: Type: 14 for Data Transfer Mode
contents.zh-CHS: 类型：14用于数据传输模式

contents.text: Length: 1
contents.zh-CHS: 长度：1

contents.text: Data Mode: An 8-bit value describing the type of information being requested. The following enumerated values are supported:
contents.zh-CHS: 数据模式：描述所请求信息类型的8位值。支持以下枚举值：

contents.text: 0 - Reserved
contents.zh-CHS: 0-保留

contents.text: 1 - WTP Crash Data
contents.zh-CHS: 1-WTP碰撞数据

contents.text: 2 - WTP Memory Dump
contents.zh-CHS: 2-WTP内存转储

contents.text: 4.6.17. Decryption Error Report
contents.zh-CHS: 4.6.17. 解密错误报告

contents.text: The Decryption Error Report message element value is used by the WTP to inform the AC of decryption errors that have occurred since the last report. Note that this error reporting mechanism is not used if encryption and decryption services are provided in the AC.
contents.zh-CHS: WTP使用解密错误报告消息元素值通知AC自上次报告以来发生的解密错误。请注意，如果AC中提供了加密和解密服务，则不使用此错误报告机制。

contents.text: Type: 15 for Decryption Error Report
contents.zh-CHS: 类型：15用于解密错误报告

contents.text: Length:   >= 9
Radio ID: The Radio Identifier refers to an interface index on the WTP, whose value is between one (1) and 31.
contents.zh-CHS: 无线电标识：无线电标识是指WTP上的接口索引，其值介于1和31之间。

contents.text: Num of Entries: The number of instances of the Length/MAC Address fields in the array. This field MUST NOT exceed the value of 255.
contents.zh-CHS: 条目数：数组中长度/MAC地址字段的实例数。此字段不得超过255的值。

contents.text: Length: The length of the MAC Address field. The formats and lengths specified in [EUI-48] and [EUI-64] are supported.
contents.zh-CHS: 长度：MAC地址字段的长度。支持[EUI-48]和[EUI-64]中指定的格式和长度。

contents.text: MAC Address: MAC address of the station that has caused decryption errors.
contents.zh-CHS: MAC地址：导致解密错误的站点的MAC地址。

contents.text: 4.6.18. Decryption Error Report Period
contents.zh-CHS: 4.6.18. 解密错误报告期

contents.text: The Decryption Error Report Period message element value is used by the AC to inform the WTP how frequently it should send decryption error report messages. Note that this error reporting mechanism is not used if encryption and decryption services are provided in the AC.
contents.zh-CHS: AC使用解密错误报告周期消息元素值通知WTP发送解密错误报告消息的频率。请注意，如果AC中提供了加密和解密服务，则不使用此错误报告机制。

contents.text: Type: 16 for Decryption Error Report Period
contents.zh-CHS: 类型：16用于解密错误报告期

contents.text: Length: 3
contents.zh-CHS: 长度：3

contents.text: Radio ID: The Radio Identifier refers to an interface index on the WTP, whose value is between one (1) and 31.
contents.zh-CHS: 无线电标识：无线电标识是指WTP上的接口索引，其值介于1和31之间。

contents.text: Report Interval: A 16-bit unsigned integer indicating the time, in seconds. The default value for this message element can be found in Section 4.7.11.
contents.zh-CHS: 报告间隔：表示时间的16位无符号整数，以秒为单位。该消息元素的默认值见第4.7.11节。

contents.text: 4.6.19. Delete MAC ACL Entry
contents.zh-CHS: 4.6.19. 删除MAC ACL条目

contents.text: The Delete MAC ACL Entry message element is used by an AC to delete a MAC ACL entry on a WTP, ensuring that the WTP provides service to the MAC addresses provided in the message.
contents.zh-CHS: AC使用删除MAC ACL条目消息元素删除WTP上的MAC ACL条目，确保WTP向消息中提供的MAC地址提供服务。

contents.text: Type: 17 for Delete MAC ACL Entry
contents.zh-CHS: 类型：17用于删除MAC ACL条目

contents.text: Length:   >= 8
Num of Entries: The number of instances of the Length/MAC Address fields in the array. This field MUST NOT exceed the value of 255.
contents.zh-CHS: 条目数：数组中长度/MAC地址字段的实例数。此字段不得超过255的值。

contents.text: Length: The length of the MAC Address field. The formats and lengths specified in [EUI-48] and [EUI-64] are supported.
contents.zh-CHS: 长度：MAC地址字段的长度。支持[EUI-48]和[EUI-64]中指定的格式和长度。

contents.text: MAC Address: An array of MAC addresses to delete from the ACL.
contents.zh-CHS: MAC地址：要从ACL中删除的MAC地址数组。

contents.text: 4.6.20. Delete Station

The Delete Station message element is used by the AC to inform a WTP that it should no longer provide service to a particular station. The WTP MUST terminate service to the station immediately upon receiving this message element.
contents.zh-CHS: AC使用删除站点消息元素通知WTP它不应再向特定站点提供服务。WTP必须在收到此消息元素后立即终止对站点的服务。

contents.text: The transmission of a Delete Station message element could occur for various reasons, including for administrative reasons, or if the station has roamed to another WTP.
contents.zh-CHS: 删除站点消息元素的传输可能出于各种原因，包括管理原因，或者如果站点已漫游到另一个WTP。

contents.text: The Delete Station message element MAY be sent by the WTP, in the WTP Event Request message, to inform the AC that a particular station is no longer being provided service. This could occur as a result of an Idle Timeout (see section 4.4.43), due to internal resource shortages or for some other reason.
contents.zh-CHS: 可由WTP在WTP事件请求消息中发送删除站消息元素，以通知AC特定站不再被提供服务。这可能是由于内部资源短缺或其他原因导致的空闲超时（见第4.4.43节）。

contents.text: Type: 18 for Delete Station
contents.zh-CHS: 类型：18用于删除站点

contents.text: Length:   >= 8
Radio ID: An 8-bit value representing the radio, whose value is between one (1) and 31.
contents.zh-CHS: 无线电ID：表示无线电的8位值，其值介于1和31之间。

contents.text: Length: The length of the MAC Address field. The formats and lengths specified in [EUI-48] and [EUI-64] are supported.
contents.zh-CHS: 长度：MAC地址字段的长度。支持[EUI-48]和[EUI-64]中指定的格式和长度。

contents.text: MAC Address: The station's MAC address.
contents.zh-CHS: MAC地址：站点的MAC地址。

contents.text: 4.6.21. Discovery Type
The Discovery Type message element is used by the WTP to indicate how it has come to know about the existence of the AC to which it is sending the Discovery Request message.
contents.zh-CHS: WTP使用发现类型消息元素来指示它如何知道它正在向其发送发现请求消息的AC的存在。

contents.text: Type: 20 for Discovery Type
contents.zh-CHS: 类型：发现类型为20

contents.text: Length: 1
contents.zh-CHS: 长度：1

contents.text: Discovery Type: An 8-bit value indicating how the WTP discovered the AC. The following enumerated values are supported:
contents.zh-CHS: 发现类型：一个8位值，指示WTP如何发现AC。支持以下枚举值：

contents.text: 0 - Unknown
contents.zh-CHS: 0-未知

contents.text: 1 - Static Configuration
contents.zh-CHS: 1-静态配置

contents.text: 2 - DHCP
contents.zh-CHS: 2-DHCP

contents.text: 3 - DNS
contents.zh-CHS: 3-DNS

contents.text: 4 - AC Referral (used when the AC was configured either through the AC IPv4 List or AC IPv6 List message element)
contents.zh-CHS: 4-AC参考（通过AC IPv4列表或AC IPv6列表消息元素配置AC时使用）

contents.text: 4.6.22. Duplicate IPv4 Address
contents.zh-CHS: 4.6.22. 重复的IPv4地址

contents.text: The Duplicate IPv4 Address message element is used by a WTP to inform an AC that it has detected another IP device using the same IP address that the WTP is currently using.
contents.zh-CHS: WTP使用重复IPv4地址消息元素通知AC，它已检测到另一个IP设备使用WTP当前使用的相同IP地址。

contents.text: The WTP MUST transmit this message element with the status set to 1 after it has detected a duplicate IP address. When the WTP detects that the duplicate IP address has been cleared, it MUST send this message element with the status set to 0.
contents.zh-CHS: WTP在检测到重复的IP地址后，必须以设置为1的状态发送此消息元素。当WTP检测到重复IP地址已被清除时，它必须发送状态设置为0的此消息元素。

contents.text: Type: 21 for Duplicate IPv4 Address
contents.zh-CHS: 类型：21表示重复的IPv4地址

contents.text: Length:   >= 12
IP Address: The IP address currently used by the WTP.
contents.zh-CHS: IP地址：WTP当前使用的IP地址。

contents.text: Status: The status of the duplicate IP address. The value MUST be set to 1 when a duplicate address is detected, and 0 when the duplicate address has been cleared.
contents.zh-CHS: 状态：重复IP地址的状态。检测到重复地址时，该值必须设置为1，清除重复地址时，该值必须设置为0。

contents.text: Length: The length of the MAC Address field. The formats and lengths specified in [EUI-48] and [EUI-64] are supported.
contents.zh-CHS: 长度：MAC地址字段的长度。支持[EUI-48]和[EUI-64]中指定的格式和长度。

contents.text: MAC Address: The MAC address of the offending device.
contents.zh-CHS: MAC地址：违规设备的MAC地址。

contents.text: 4.6.23. Duplicate IPv6 Address
contents.zh-CHS: 4.6.23. 重复的IPv6地址

contents.text: The Duplicate IPv6 Address message element is used by a WTP to inform an AC that it has detected another host using the same IP address that the WTP is currently using.
contents.zh-CHS: WTP使用复制IPv6地址消息元素通知AC，它已检测到另一台主机使用WTP当前使用的相同IP地址。

contents.text: The WTP MUST transmit this message element with the status set to 1 after it has detected a duplicate IP address. When the WTP detects that the duplicate IP address has been cleared, it MUST send this message element with the status set to 0.
contents.zh-CHS: WTP在检测到重复的IP地址后，必须以设置为1的状态发送此消息元素。当WTP检测到重复IP地址已被清除时，它必须发送状态设置为0的此消息元素。

contents.text: Type: 22 for Duplicate IPv6 Address
contents.zh-CHS: 类型：22表示重复的IPv6地址

contents.text: Length:   >= 24
IP Address: The IP address currently used by the WTP.
contents.zh-CHS: IP地址：WTP当前使用的IP地址。

contents.text: Status: The status of the duplicate IP address. The value MUST be set to 1 when a duplicate address is detected, and 0 when the duplicate address has been cleared.
contents.zh-CHS: 状态：重复IP地址的状态。检测到重复地址时，该值必须设置为1，清除重复地址时，该值必须设置为0。

contents.text: Length: The length of the MAC Address field. The formats and lengths specified in [EUI-48] and [EUI-64] are supported.
contents.zh-CHS: 长度：MAC地址字段的长度。支持[EUI-48]和[EUI-64]中指定的格式和长度。

contents.text: MAC Address: The MAC address of the offending device.
contents.zh-CHS: MAC地址：违规设备的MAC地址。

contents.text: 4.6.24. Idle Timeout
The Idle Timeout message element is sent by the AC to the WTP to provide the Idle Timeout value that the WTP SHOULD enforce for its active stations. The value applies to all radios on the WTP.
contents.zh-CHS: 空闲超时消息元素由AC发送到WTP，以提供WTP应为其活动站点强制执行的空闲超时值。该值适用于WTP上的所有收音机。

contents.text: Type: 23 for Idle Timeout
contents.zh-CHS: 类型：23表示空闲超时

contents.text: Length: 4
contents.zh-CHS: 长度：4

contents.text: Timeout: The current Idle Timeout, in seconds, to be enforced by the WTP. The default value for this message element is specified in Section 4.7.8.
contents.zh-CHS: 超时：WTP将强制执行的当前空闲超时（以秒为单位）。第4.7.8节规定了此消息元素的默认值。

contents.text: 4.6.25. ECN Support
contents.zh-CHS: 4.6.25. ECN支持

contents.text: The ECN Support message element is sent by both the WTP and the AC to indicate their support for the Explicit Congestion Notification (ECN) bits, as defined in [RFC3168].
contents.zh-CHS: 如[RFC3168]中所定义，WTP和AC均发送ECN支持消息元素，以表明其对显式拥塞通知（ECN）位的支持。

contents.text: Type: 53 for ECN Support
contents.zh-CHS: 类型：53用于ECN支持

contents.text: Length: 1
contents.zh-CHS: 长度：1

contents.text: ECN Support: An 8-bit value representing the sender's support for ECN, as defined in [RFC3168]. All CAPWAP Implementations MUST support the Limited ECN Support mode. Full ECN Support is used if both the WTP and AC advertise the capability for "Full and Limited ECN" Support; otherwise, Limited ECN Support is used.
contents.zh-CHS: ECN支持：一个8位值，表示发送方对ECN的支持，如[RFC3168]中所定义。所有CAPWAP实施必须支持有限的ECN支持模式。如果WTP和AC都宣传“完全和有限ECN”支持的能力，则使用完全ECN支持；否则，将使用有限的ECN支持。

contents.text: 0 - Limited ECN Support
contents.zh-CHS: 0-有限的ECN支持

contents.text: 1 - Full and Limited ECN Support
contents.zh-CHS: 1-全面和有限的ECN支持

contents.text: 4.6.26. Image Data
The Image Data message element is present in the Image Data Request message sent by the AC and contains the following fields.
contents.zh-CHS: 图像数据消息元素存在于AC发送的图像数据请求消息中，包含以下字段。

contents.text: Type: 24 for Image Data
contents.zh-CHS: 类型：24用于图像数据

contents.text: Length:   >= 1
Data Type: An 8-bit value representing the image Data Type. The following enumerated values are supported:
contents.zh-CHS: 数据类型：表示图像数据类型的8位值。支持以下枚举值：

contents.text: 1 - Image data is included.
contents.zh-CHS: 1-包括图像数据。

contents.text: 2 - Last Image Data Block is included (EOF).
contents.zh-CHS: 2-包括最后一个图像数据块（EOF）。

contents.text: 5 - An error occurred. Transfer is aborted.
contents.zh-CHS: 5-发生错误。传输被中止。

contents.text: Data: The Image Data field contains up to 1024 characters, and its length is inferred from this message element's length field. If the block being sent is the last one, the Data Type field is set to 2. The AC MAY opt to abort the data transfer by setting the Data Type field to 5. When the Data Type field is 5, the Value field has a zero length.
contents.zh-CHS: 数据：图像数据字段最多包含1024个字符，其长度由此消息元素的长度字段推断。如果要发送的块是最后一个，则数据类型字段设置为2。AC可通过将数据类型字段设置为5来选择中止数据传输。当数据类型字段为5时，值字段的长度为零。

contents.text: 4.6.27. Image Identifier
contents.zh-CHS: 4.6.27. 图像标识符

contents.text: The Image Identifier message element is sent by the AC to the WTP to indicate the expected active software version that is to be run on the WTP. The WTP sends the Image Identifier message element in order to request a specific software version from the AC. The actual download process is defined in Section 9.1. The value is a variable-length UTF-8 encoded string [RFC3629], which is NOT zero terminated.
contents.zh-CHS: 图像标识符消息元素由AC发送到WTP，以指示将在WTP上运行的预期活动软件版本。WTP发送图像标识符消息元素，以便从AC请求特定软件版本。实际下载过程在第9.1节中定义。该值是一个可变长度UTF-8编码字符串[RFC3629]，它不是以零结尾的。

contents.text: Type: 25 for Image Identifier
contents.zh-CHS: 类型：25表示图像标识符

contents.text: Length:   >= 5
Vendor Identifier: A 32-bit value containing the IANA-assigned "SMI Network Management Private Enterprise Codes".
contents.zh-CHS: 供应商标识符：包含IANA分配的“SMI网络管理私有企业代码”的32位值。

contents.text: Data: A variable-length UTF-8 encoded string [RFC3629] containing the firmware identifier to be run on the WTP, whose length MUST NOT exceed 1024 octets. The length of this field is inferred from this message element's length field.
contents.zh-CHS: 数据：可变长度UTF-8编码字符串[RFC3629]，包含要在WTP上运行的固件标识符，其长度不得超过1024个八位字节。此字段的长度是根据此消息元素的长度字段推断的。

contents.text: 4.6.28. Image Information
The Image Information message element is present in the Image Data Response message sent by the AC to the WTP and contains the following fields.
contents.zh-CHS: 图像信息消息元素存在于AC发送至WTP的图像数据响应消息中，并包含以下字段。

contents.text: Type: 26 for Image Information
contents.zh-CHS: 类型：26用于图像信息

contents.text: Length: 20
contents.zh-CHS: 长度：20

contents.text: File Size: A 32-bit value containing the size of the file, in bytes, that will be transferred by the AC to the WTP.
contents.zh-CHS: 文件大小：一个32位值，包含AC将传输到WTP的文件大小（以字节为单位）。

contents.text: Hash: A 16-octet MD5 hash of the image using the procedures defined in [RFC1321].
contents.zh-CHS: 哈希：使用[RFC1321]中定义的过程对图像进行16个八位MD5哈希。

contents.text: 4.6.29. Initiate Download

The Initiate Download message element is used by the WTP to inform the AC that the AC SHOULD initiate a firmware upgrade. The AC subsequently transmits an Image Data Request message, which includes the Image Data message element. This message element does not contain any data.
contents.zh-CHS: WTP使用Initiate Download message元素通知AC AC应启动固件升级。AC随后发送包括图像数据消息元素的图像数据请求消息。此消息元素不包含任何数据。

contents.text: Type: 27 for Initiate Download
contents.zh-CHS: 类型：27用于启动下载

contents.text: Length: 0
contents.zh-CHS: 长度：0

contents.text: 4.6.30. Location Data

The Location Data message element is a variable-length byte UTF-8 encoded string [RFC3629] containing user-defined location information (e.g., "Next to Fridge"). This information is configurable by the network administrator, and allows the WTP location to be determined. The string is not zero terminated.
contents.zh-CHS: 位置数据消息元素是一个可变长度字节UTF-8编码字符串[RFC3629]，包含用户定义的位置信息（例如，“冰箱旁边”）。该信息可由网络管理员配置，并允许确定WTP位置。字符串不是以零结尾的。

contents.text: Type: 28 for Location Data
contents.zh-CHS: 类型：28用于位置数据

contents.text: Length:   >= 1
Location: A non-zero-terminated UTF-8 encoded string [RFC3629] containing the WTP location, whose maximum size MUST NOT exceed 1024.
contents.zh-CHS: 位置：包含WTP位置的非零终止UTF-8编码字符串[RFC3629]，其最大大小不得超过1024。

contents.text: 4.6.31. Maximum Message Length
contents.zh-CHS: 4.6.31. 最大消息长度

contents.text: The Maximum Message Length message element is included in the Join Request message by the WTP to indicate the maximum CAPWAP message length that it supports to the AC. The Maximum Message Length message element is optionally included in Join Response message by the AC to indicate the maximum CAPWAP message length that it supports to the WTP.
contents.zh-CHS: WTP将最大消息长度消息元素包含在加入请求消息中，以指示其对AC支持的最大CAPWAP消息长度。AC可选择将最大消息长度消息元素包含在加入响应消息中，以指示其对WTP支持的最大CAPWAP消息长度。

contents.text: Type: 29 for Maximum Message Length
contents.zh-CHS: 类型：29表示最大消息长度

contents.text: Length: 2
contents.zh-CHS: 长度：2

contents.text: Maximum Message Length A 16-bit unsigned integer indicating the maximum message length.
contents.zh-CHS: 最大消息长度指示最大消息长度的16位无符号整数。

contents.text: 4.6.32. MTU Discovery Padding
contents.zh-CHS: 4.6.32. MTU Discovery Paddingtranslate error, please retry

contents.text: The MTU Discovery Padding message element is used as padding to perform MTU discovery, and MUST contain octets of value 0xFF, of any length.
contents.zh-CHS: MTU发现填充消息元素用作执行MTU发现的填充，并且必须包含任意长度的值为0xFF的八位字节。

contents.text: Type: 52 for MTU Discovery Padding
contents.zh-CHS: 类型：52用于MTU查找填充

contents.text: Length: Variable
contents.zh-CHS: 长度：可变

contents.text: Pad: A variable-length pad, filled with the value 0xFF.
contents.zh-CHS: Pad：可变长度的Pad，填充值0xFF。

contents.text: 4.6.33. Radio Administrative State
contents.zh-CHS: 4.6.33. 无线电管理国

contents.text: The Radio Administrative State message element is used to communicate the state of a particular radio. The Radio Administrative State message element is sent by the AC to change the state of the WTP. The WTP saves the value, to ensure that it remains across WTP resets. The WTP communicates this message element during the configuration phase, in the Configuration Status Request message, to ensure that the AC has the WTP radio current administrative state settings. The message element contains the following fields:
contents.zh-CHS: 无线电管理状态消息元素用于传达特定无线电的状态。AC发送无线电管理状态消息元素以更改WTP的状态。WTP保存该值，以确保该值在WTP重置期间保持不变。WTP在配置阶段在配置状态请求消息中传递此消息元素，以确保AC具有WTP无线电当前管理状态设置。message元素包含以下字段：

contents.text: Type: 31 for Radio Administrative State
contents.zh-CHS: 类型：31表示无线电管理状态

contents.text: Length: 2
contents.zh-CHS: 长度：2

contents.text: Radio ID: An 8-bit value representing the radio to configure, whose value is between one (1) and 31. The Radio ID field MAY also include the value of 0xff, which is used to identify the WTP. If an AC wishes to change the administrative state of a WTP, it includes 0xff in the Radio ID field.
contents.zh-CHS: Radio ID：表示要配置的无线电的8位值，其值介于一（1）和31之间。无线电ID字段还可以包括0xff的值，该值用于识别WTP。如果AC希望更改WTP的管理状态，则在Radio ID字段中包含0xff。

contents.text: Admin State: An 8-bit value representing the administrative state of the radio. The default value for the Admin State field is listed in Section 4.8.1. The following enumerated values are supported:
contents.zh-CHS: 管理状态：表示无线电管理状态的8位值。第4.8.1节列出了管理状态字段的默认值。支持以下枚举值：

contents.text: 0 - Reserved
contents.zh-CHS: 0-保留

contents.text: 1 - Enabled
contents.zh-CHS: 1-启用

contents.text: 2 - Disabled
contents.zh-CHS: 2-残疾人士

contents.text: 4.6.34. Radio Operational State
contents.zh-CHS: 4.6.34. 无线电工作状态

contents.text: The Radio Operational State message element is sent by the WTP to the AC to communicate a radio's operational state. This message element is included in the Configuration Update Response message by the WTP if it was requested to change the state of its radio, via the Radio Administrative State message element, but was unable to comply to the request. This message element is included in the Change State Event message when a WTP radio state was changed unexpectedly. This could occur due to a hardware failure. Note that the operational state setting is not saved on the WTP, and therefore does not remain across WTP resets. The value contains three fields, as shown below.
contents.zh-CHS: 无线操作状态消息元素由WTP发送至AC，以传达无线操作状态。如果WTP通过无线电管理状态消息元素被请求更改其无线电状态，但无法遵守请求，则该消息元素将包含在配置更新响应消息中。当WTP无线电状态意外更改时，此消息元素包含在更改状态事件消息中。这可能是由于硬件故障造成的。请注意，操作状态设置未保存在WTP上，因此不会在WTP重置期间保持不变。该值包含三个字段，如下所示。

contents.text: Type: 32 for Radio Operational State
contents.zh-CHS: 类型：32表示无线电工作状态

contents.text: Length: 3
contents.zh-CHS: 长度：3

contents.text: Radio ID: The Radio Identifier refers to an interface index on the WTP, whose value is between one (1) and 31. A value of 0xFF is invalid, as it is not possible to change the WTP's operational state.
contents.zh-CHS: 无线电标识：无线电标识是指WTP上的接口索引，其值介于1和31之间。0xFF值无效，因为无法更改WTP的运行状态。

contents.text: State: An 8-bit Boolean value representing the state of the radio. The following enumerated values are supported:
contents.zh-CHS: 状态：表示收音机状态的8位布尔值。支持以下枚举值：

contents.text: 0 - Reserved
contents.zh-CHS: 0-保留

contents.text: 1 - Enabled
contents.zh-CHS: 1-启用

contents.text: 2 - Disabled
contents.zh-CHS: 2-残疾人士

contents.text: Cause: When a radio is inoperable, the cause field contains the reason the radio is out of service. The following enumerated values are supported:
contents.zh-CHS: 原因：当收音机不可操作时，原因字段包含收音机停止工作的原因。支持以下枚举值：

contents.text: 0 - Normal
contents.zh-CHS: 0-正常

contents.text: 1 - Radio Failure
contents.zh-CHS: 1-无线电故障

contents.text: 2 - Software Failure
contents.zh-CHS: 2-软件故障

contents.text: 3 - Administratively Set
contents.zh-CHS: 3-行政设置

contents.text: 4.6.35. Result Code
The Result Code message element value is a 32-bit integer value, indicating the result of the Request message corresponding to the sequence number included in the Response message.
contents.zh-CHS: 结果代码消息元素值是32位整数值，指示与响应消息中包含的序列号相对应的请求消息的结果。

contents.text: Type: 33 for Result Code
contents.zh-CHS: 类型：33表示结果代码

contents.text: Length: 4
contents.zh-CHS: 长度：4

contents.text: Result Code: The following enumerated values are defined:
contents.zh-CHS: 结果代码：定义了以下枚举值：

contents.text: 0 Success
contents.zh-CHS: 0成功

contents.text: 1 Failure (AC List Message Element MUST Be Present)
contents.zh-CHS: 1故障（AC列表消息元素必须存在）

contents.text: 2 Success (NAT Detected)
contents.zh-CHS: 2成功（检测到NAT）

contents.text: 3 Join Failure (Unspecified)
contents.zh-CHS: 3连接失败（未指定）

contents.text: 4 Join Failure (Resource Depletion)
contents.zh-CHS: 4连接失败（资源耗尽）

contents.text: 5 Join Failure (Unknown Source)
contents.zh-CHS: 5连接失败（未知源）

contents.text: 6 Join Failure (Incorrect Data)
contents.zh-CHS: 6连接失败（数据不正确）

contents.text: 7 Join Failure (Session ID Already in Use)
contents.zh-CHS: 7加入失败（会话ID已在使用）

contents.text: 8 Join Failure (WTP Hardware Not Supported)
contents.zh-CHS: 8连接失败（不支持WTP硬件）

contents.text: 9 Join Failure (Binding Not Supported)
contents.zh-CHS: 9连接失败（不支持绑定）

contents.text: 10 Reset Failure (Unable to Reset)
contents.zh-CHS: 10复位失败（无法复位）

contents.text: 11 Reset Failure (Firmware Write Error)
contents.zh-CHS: 11复位故障（固件写入错误）

contents.text: 12 Configuration Failure (Unable to Apply Requested Configuration - Service Provided Anyhow)
contents.zh-CHS: 12配置失败（无法应用请求的配置-无论如何都提供了服务）

contents.text: 13 Configuration Failure (Unable to Apply Requested Configuration - Service Not Provided)
contents.zh-CHS: 13配置失败（无法应用请求的配置-未提供服务）

contents.text: 14 Image Data Error (Invalid Checksum)
contents.zh-CHS: 14图像数据错误（校验和无效）

contents.text: 15 Image Data Error (Invalid Data Length)
contents.zh-CHS: 15图像数据错误（数据长度无效）

contents.text: 16 Image Data Error (Other Error)
contents.zh-CHS: 16图像数据错误（其他错误）

contents.text: 17 Image Data Error (Image Already Present)
contents.zh-CHS: 17图像数据错误（图像已存在）

contents.text: 18 Message Unexpected (Invalid in Current State)
contents.zh-CHS: 18意外消息（当前状态下无效）

contents.text: 19 Message Unexpected (Unrecognized Request)
contents.zh-CHS: 19意外消息（无法识别的请求）

contents.text: 20 Failure - Missing Mandatory Message Element
contents.zh-CHS: 20故障-缺少必需的消息元素

contents.text: 21 Failure - Unrecognized Message Element
contents.zh-CHS: 21故障-无法识别的消息元素

contents.text: 22 Data Transfer Error (No Information to Transfer)
contents.zh-CHS: 22数据传输错误（无需传输的信息）

contents.text: 4.6.36. Returned Message Element
contents.zh-CHS: 4.6.36. 返回消息元素

contents.text: The Returned Message Element is sent by the WTP in the Change State Event Request message to communicate to the AC which message elements in the Configuration Status Response it was unable to apply locally. The Returned Message Element message element contains a result code indicating the reason that the configuration could not be applied, and encapsulates the failed message element.
contents.zh-CHS: 返回的消息元素由WTP在更改状态事件请求消息中发送，以与AC通信其无法在本地应用的配置状态响应中的哪些消息元素。返回的消息元素包含一个结果代码，指示无法应用配置的原因，并封装失败的消息元素。

contents.text: Type: 34 for Returned Message Element
contents.zh-CHS: 返回消息元素的类型：34

contents.text: Length:   >= 6
Reason: The reason the configuration in the offending message element could not be applied by the WTP. The following enumerated values are supported:
contents.zh-CHS: 原因：WTP无法应用有问题消息元素中的配置的原因。支持以下枚举值：

contents.text: 0 - Reserved
contents.zh-CHS: 0-保留

contents.text: 1 - Unknown Message Element
contents.zh-CHS: 1-未知消息元素

contents.text: 2 - Unsupported Message Element
contents.zh-CHS: 2-不支持的消息元素

contents.text: 3 - Unknown Message Element Value
contents.zh-CHS: 3-未知消息元素值

contents.text: 4 - Unsupported Message Element Value
contents.zh-CHS: 4-不支持的消息元素值

contents.text: Length: The length of the Message Element field, which MUST NOT exceed 255 octets.
contents.zh-CHS: 长度：消息元素字段的长度，不得超过255个八位字节。

contents.text: Message Element: The Message Element field encapsulates the message element sent by the AC in the Configuration Status Response message that caused the error.
contents.zh-CHS: Message Element（消息元素）：Message Element（消息元素）字段将AC发送的消息元素封装在导致错误的配置状态响应消息中。

contents.text: 4.6.37. Session ID
The Session ID message element value contains a randomly generated unsigned 128-bit integer.
contents.zh-CHS: 会话ID消息元素值包含随机生成的无符号128位整数。

contents.text: Type: 35 for Session ID
contents.zh-CHS: 类型：会话ID为35

contents.text: Length: 16
contents.zh-CHS: 长度：16

contents.text: Session ID: A 128-bit unsigned integer used as a random session identifier
contents.zh-CHS: 会话ID：用作随机会话标识符的128位无符号整数

contents.text: 4.6.38. Statistics Timer
contents.zh-CHS: 4.6.38. 统计计时器

contents.text: The Statistics Timer message element value is used by the AC to inform the WTP of the frequency with which it expects to receive updated statistics.
contents.zh-CHS: AC使用统计定时器消息元素值通知WTP其预期接收更新统计信息的频率。

contents.text: Type: 36 for Statistics Timer
contents.zh-CHS: 类型：36用于统计计时器

contents.text: Length: 2
contents.zh-CHS: 长度：2

contents.text: Statistics Timer: A 16-bit unsigned integer indicating the time, in seconds. The default value for this timer is specified in Section 4.7.14.
contents.zh-CHS: 统计计时器：表示时间的16位无符号整数，以秒为单位。第4.7.14节规定了该定时器的默认值。

contents.text: 4.6.39. Vendor Specific Payload
contents.zh-CHS: 4.6.39. 供应商特定有效载荷

contents.text: The Vendor Specific Payload message element is used to communicate vendor-specific information between the WTP and the AC. The Vendor Specific Payload message element MAY be present in any CAPWAP message. The exchange of vendor-specific data between the MUST NOT modify the behavior of the base CAPWAP protocol and state machine. The message element uses the following format:
contents.zh-CHS: 供应商特定有效负载消息元素用于在WTP和AC之间传送供应商特定信息。供应商特定有效负载消息元素可能存在于任何CAPWAP消息中。在之间交换特定于供应商的数据不得修改基本CAPWAP协议和状态机的行为。message元素使用以下格式：

contents.text: Type: 37 for Vendor Specific Payload
contents.zh-CHS: 类型：37用于供应商特定的有效载荷

contents.text: Length:   >= 7
Vendor Identifier: A 32-bit value containing the IANA-assigned "SMI Network Management Private Enterprise Codes" [RFC3232].
contents.zh-CHS: 供应商标识符：32位值，包含IANA分配的“SMI网络管理专用企业代码”[RFC3232]。

contents.text: Element ID: A 16-bit Element Identifier that is managed by the vendor.
contents.zh-CHS: 元素ID：由供应商管理的16位元素标识符。

contents.text: Data: Variable-length vendor-specific information, whose contents and format are proprietary and understood based on the Element ID field. This field MUST NOT exceed 2048 octets.
contents.zh-CHS: 数据：可变长度的供应商特定信息，其内容和格式是专有的，并根据元素ID字段理解。此字段不得超过2048个八位字节。

contents.text: 4.6.40. WTP Board Data
contents.zh-CHS: 4.6.40. WTP板数据

contents.text: The WTP Board Data message element is sent by the WTP to the AC and contains information about the hardware present.
contents.zh-CHS: WTP板数据消息元素由WTP发送至AC，并包含有关现有硬件的信息。

contents.text: Type: 38 for WTP Board Data
contents.zh-CHS: 类型：38用于WTP板数据

contents.text: Length:   >=14

Vendor Identifier: A 32-bit value containing the IANA-assigned "SMI Network Management Private Enterprise Codes", identifying the WTP hardware manufacturer. The Vendor Identifier field MUST NOT be set to zero.
contents.zh-CHS: 供应商标识符：包含IANA分配的“SMI网络管理私有企业代码”的32位值，用于标识WTP硬件制造商。供应商标识符字段不能设置为零。

contents.text: Board Data Sub-Element: The WTP Board Data message element contains multiple Board Data sub-elements, some of which are mandatory and some are optional, as described below. The Board Data Type values are not extensible by vendors, and are therefore not coupled along with the Vendor Identifier field. The Board Data sub-element has the following format:
contents.zh-CHS: 线路板数据子元素：WTP线路板数据消息元素包含多个线路板数据子元素，其中一些是必需的，一些是可选的，如下所述。电路板数据类型值不可由供应商扩展，因此不会与供应商标识符字段耦合。线路板数据子元素具有以下格式：

contents.text: Board Data Type: The Board Data Type field identifies the data being encoded. The CAPWAP protocol defines the following values, and each of these types identify whether their presence is mandatory or optional:
contents.zh-CHS: 线路板数据类型：线路板数据类型字段标识正在编码的数据。CAPWAP协议定义了以下值，这些值中的每一种都标识了它们的存在是强制性的还是可选的：

contents.text: 0 - WTP Model Number: The WTP Model Number MUST be included in the WTP Board Data message element.
contents.zh-CHS: 0-WTP型号：WTP型号必须包含在WTP板数据消息元素中。

contents.text: 1 - WTP Serial Number: The WTP Serial Number MUST be included in the WTP Board Data message element.
contents.zh-CHS: 1-WTP序列号：WTP序列号必须包含在WTP板数据消息元素中。

contents.text: 2 - Board ID: A hardware identifier, which MAY be included in the WTP Board Data message element.
contents.zh-CHS: 2-板ID：硬件标识符，可包含在WTP板数据消息元素中。

contents.text: 3 - Board Revision: A revision number of the board, which MAY be included in the WTP Board Data message element.
contents.zh-CHS: 3-电路板版本：电路板的版本号，可包含在WTP电路板数据消息元素中。

contents.text: 4 - Base MAC Address: The WTP's Base MAC address, which MAY be assigned to the primary Ethernet interface.
contents.zh-CHS: 4-基本MAC地址：WTP的基本MAC地址，可分配给主以太网接口。

contents.text: Board Data Length: The length of the data in the Board Data Value field, whose length MUST NOT exceed 1024 octets.
contents.zh-CHS: 线路板数据长度：线路板数据值字段中的数据长度，其长度不得超过1024个八位字节。

contents.text: Board Data Value: The data associated with the Board Data Type field for this Board Data sub-element.
contents.zh-CHS: 线路板数据值：与此线路板数据子元素的线路板数据类型字段关联的数据。

contents.text: 4.6.41. WTP Descriptor
contents.zh-CHS: 4.6.41. WTP描述符

contents.text: The WTP Descriptor message element is used by a WTP to communicate its current hardware and software (firmware) configuration. The value contains the following fields:
contents.zh-CHS: WTP描述符消息元素由WTP用于通信其当前硬件和软件（固件）配置。该值包含以下字段：

contents.text: Type: 39 for WTP Descriptor
contents.zh-CHS: 类型：39用于WTP描述符

contents.text: Length:   >= 33
Max Radios: An 8-bit value representing the number of radios (where each radio is identified via the Radio ID field) supported by the WTP.
contents.zh-CHS: Max Radios：一个8位值，表示WTP支持的无线电数量（每个无线电通过无线电ID字段标识）。

contents.text: Radios in use: An 8-bit value representing the number of radios in use in the WTP.
contents.zh-CHS: 正在使用的无线电：一个8位值，表示WTP中正在使用的无线电数量。

contents.text: Num Encrypt: The number of 3-byte Encryption sub-elements that follow this field. The value of the Num Encrypt field MUST be between one (1) and 255.
contents.zh-CHS: Num Encrypt：此字段后面的3字节加密子元素数。Num Encrypt字段的值必须介于一（1）和255之间。

contents.text: Encryption Sub-Element: The WTP Descriptor message element MUST contain at least one Encryption sub-element. One sub-element is present for each binding supported by the WTP. The Encryption sub-element has the following format:
contents.zh-CHS: 加密子元素：WTP描述符消息元素必须至少包含一个加密子元素。WTP支持的每个绑定都有一个子元素。加密子元素具有以下格式：

contents.text: Resvd: The 3-bit field is reserved for future use. All implementations complying with this protocol MUST set to zero any bits that are reserved in the version of the protocol supported by that implementation. Receivers MUST ignore all bits not defined for the version of the protocol they support.
contents.zh-CHS: Resvd：3位字段保留供将来使用。符合此协议的所有实现必须将该实现支持的协议版本中保留的任何位设置为零。接收器必须忽略所有未为其支持的协议版本定义的位。

contents.text: WBID: A 5-bit field that is the wireless binding identifier. The identifier will indicate the type of wireless packet associated with the radio. The WBIDs defined in this specification can be found in Section 4.3.
contents.zh-CHS: WBID：一个5位字段，是无线绑定标识符。标识符将指示与无线电相关联的无线分组的类型。本规范中定义的WBID见第4.3节。

contents.text: Encryption Capabilities: This 16-bit field is used by the WTP to communicate its capabilities to the AC. A WTP that does not have any encryption capabilities sets this field to zero (0). Refer to the specific wireless binding for further specification of the Encryption Capabilities field.
contents.zh-CHS: 加密功能：WTP使用此16位字段将其功能与AC通信。没有任何加密功能的WTP将此字段设置为零（0）。有关加密功能字段的进一步规范，请参阅特定的无线绑定。

contents.text: Descriptor Sub-Element: The WTP Descriptor message element contains multiple Descriptor sub-elements, some of which are mandatory and some are optional, as described below. The Descriptor sub-element has the following format:
contents.zh-CHS: 描述符子元素：WTP描述符消息元素包含多个描述符子元素，其中一些是必需的，一些是可选的，如下所述。描述符子元素具有以下格式：

contents.text: Descriptor Vendor Identifier: A 32-bit value containing the IANA-assigned "SMI Network Management Private Enterprise Codes".
contents.zh-CHS: 描述符供应商标识符：包含IANA分配的“SMI网络管理专用企业代码”的32位值。

contents.text: Descriptor Type: The Descriptor Type field identifies the data being encoded. The format of the data is vendor-specific encoded in the UTF-8 format [RFC3629]. The CAPWAP protocol defines the following values, and each of these types identify whether their presence is mandatory or optional. The values listed below are used in conjunction with the Descriptor Vendor Identifier field, whose value MUST be set to zero (0). This field, combined with the Descriptor Vendor Identifier set to a non-zero (0) value, allows vendors to use a private namespace.
contents.zh-CHS: 描述符类型：描述符类型字段标识正在编码的数据。数据格式为UTF-8格式[RFC3629]中的供应商特定编码。CAPWAP协议定义了以下值，这些值中的每一种都标识它们的存在是强制性的还是可选的。下面列出的值与描述符供应商标识符字段一起使用，其值必须设置为零（0）。此字段与设置为非零（0）值的描述符供应商标识符相结合，允许供应商使用私有命名空间。

contents.text: 0 - Hardware Version: The WTP hardware version number MUST be present.
contents.zh-CHS: 0-硬件版本：WTP硬件版本号必须存在。

contents.text: 1 - Active Software Version: The WTP running software version number MUST be present.
contents.zh-CHS: 1-活动软件版本：WTP运行软件版本号必须存在。

contents.text: 2 - Boot Version: The WTP boot loader version number MUST be present.
contents.zh-CHS: 2-启动版本：WTP启动加载程序版本号必须存在。

contents.text: 3 - Other Software Version: The WTP non-running software (firmware) version number MAY be present. This type is used to communicate alternate software versions that are available on the WTP's non-volatile storage.
contents.zh-CHS: 3-其他软件版本：可能存在WTP非运行软件（固件）版本号。此类型用于传送WTP非易失性存储器上可用的备用软件版本。

contents.text: Descriptor Length: Length of the vendor-specific encoding of the Descriptor Data field, whose length MUST NOT exceed 1024 octets.
contents.zh-CHS: 描述符长度：描述符数据字段的供应商特定编码的长度，其长度不得超过1024个八位字节。

contents.text: Descriptor Data: Vendor-specific data of WTP information encoded in the UTF-8 format [RFC3629].
contents.zh-CHS: 描述符数据：以UTF-8格式编码的WTP信息的供应商特定数据[RFC3629]。

contents.text: 4.6.42. WTP Fallback
contents.zh-CHS: 4.6.42. WTP回退

contents.text: The WTP Fallback message element is sent by the AC to the WTP to enable or disable automatic CAPWAP fallback in the event that a WTP detects its preferred AC to which it is not currently connected.
contents.zh-CHS: AC向WTP发送WTP回退消息元素，以在WTP检测到其当前未连接的首选AC时启用或禁用自动CAPWAP回退。

contents.text: Type: 40 for WTP Fallback
contents.zh-CHS: 类型：40用于WTP回退

contents.text: Length: 1
contents.zh-CHS: 长度：1

contents.text: Mode: The 8-bit value indicates the status of automatic CAPWAP fallback on the WTP. When enabled, if the WTP detects that its primary AC is available, and that the WTP is not connected to the primary AC, the WTP SHOULD automatically disconnect from its current AC and reconnect to its primary AC. If disabled, the WTP will only reconnect to its primary AC through manual intervention (e.g., through the Reset Request message). The default value for this field is specified in Section 4.8.9. The following enumerated values are supported:
contents.zh-CHS: 模式：8位值表示WTP上自动CAPWAP回退的状态。启用时，如果WTP检测到其主AC可用，且WTP未连接到主AC，则WTP应自动断开其当前AC并重新连接到其主AC。如果禁用，WTP将仅通过手动干预（例如，通过重置请求消息）重新连接到其主AC。第4.8.9节规定了该字段的默认值。支持以下枚举值：

contents.text: 0 - Reserved
contents.zh-CHS: 0-保留

contents.text: 1 - Enabled
contents.zh-CHS: 1-启用

contents.text: 2 - Disabled
contents.zh-CHS: 2-残疾人士

contents.text: 4.6.43. WTP Frame Tunnel Mode
contents.zh-CHS: 4.6.43. 帧隧道模式

contents.text: The WTP Frame Tunnel Mode message element allows the WTP to communicate the tunneling modes of operation that it supports to the AC. A WTP that advertises support for all types allows the AC to select which type will be used, based on its local policy.
contents.zh-CHS: WTP帧隧道模式消息元素允许WTP将其支持的隧道操作模式传达给AC。宣布支持所有类型的WTP允许AC根据其本地策略选择将使用的类型。

contents.text: Type: 41 for WTP Frame Tunnel Mode
contents.zh-CHS: 类型：41适用于WTP框架隧道模式

contents.text: Length: 1
contents.zh-CHS: 长度：1

contents.text: Reservd: A set of reserved bits for future use. All implementations complying with this protocol MUST set to zero any bits that are reserved in the version of the protocol supported by that implementation. Receivers MUST ignore all bits not defined for the version of the protocol they support.
contents.zh-CHS: Reservd：为将来使用而保留的一组位。符合此协议的所有实现必须将该实现支持的协议版本中保留的任何位设置为零。接收器必须忽略所有未为其支持的协议版本定义的位。

contents.text: N: Native Frame Tunnel mode requires the WTP and AC to encapsulate all user payloads as native wireless frames, as defined by the wireless binding (see for example Section 4.4)
contents.zh-CHS: N：本机帧隧道模式要求WTP和AC将所有用户有效负载封装为本机无线帧，如无线绑定所定义（例如，参见第4.4节）

contents.text: E: The 802.3 Frame Tunnel Mode requires the WTP and AC to encapsulate all user payload as native IEEE 802.3 frames (see Section 4.4). All user traffic is tunneled to the AC. This value MUST NOT be used when the WTP MAC Type is set to Split MAC.
contents.zh-CHS: E:802.3帧隧道模式要求WTP和AC将所有用户有效负载封装为本机IEEE 802.3帧（参见第4.4节）。所有用户流量都通过隧道传输到AC。当WTP MAC类型设置为拆分MAC时，不得使用此值。

contents.text: L: When Local Bridging is used, the WTP does not tunnel user traffic to the AC; all user traffic is locally bridged. This value MUST NOT be used when the WTP MAC Type is set to Split MAC.
contents.zh-CHS: L：当使用本地桥接时，WTP不会将用户流量隧道到AC；所有用户流量都在本地桥接。当WTP MAC类型设置为拆分MAC时，不得使用此值。

contents.text: R: A reserved bit for future use. All implementations complying with this protocol MUST set to zero any bits that are reserved in the version of the protocol supported by that implementation. Receivers MUST ignore all bits not defined for the version of the protocol they support.
contents.zh-CHS: R：为将来使用而保留的位。符合此协议的所有实现必须将该实现支持的协议版本中保留的任何位设置为零。接收器必须忽略所有未为其支持的协议版本定义的位。

contents.text: 4.6.44. WTP MAC Type
contents.zh-CHS: 4.6.44. WTP MAC类型

contents.text: The WTP MAC-Type message element allows the WTP to communicate its mode of operation to the AC. A WTP that advertises support for both modes allows the AC to select the mode to use, based on local policy.
contents.zh-CHS: WTP MAC类型消息元素允许WTP将其操作模式传达给AC。宣布支持两种模式的WTP允许AC根据本地策略选择要使用的模式。

contents.text: Type: 44 for WTP MAC Type
contents.zh-CHS: 类型：对于WTP MAC类型为44

contents.text: Length: 1
contents.zh-CHS: 长度：1

contents.text: MAC Type: The MAC mode of operation supported by the WTP. The following enumerated values are supported:
contents.zh-CHS: MAC类型：WTP支持的MAC操作模式。支持以下枚举值：

contents.text: 0 - Local MAC: Local MAC is the default mode that MUST be supported by all WTPs. When tunneling is enabled (see Section 4.6.43), the encapsulated frames MUST be in the 802.3 format (see Section 4.4.2), unless a wireless management or control frame which MAY be in its native format. Any CAPWAP binding needs to specify the format of management and control wireless frames.
contents.zh-CHS: 0-本地MAC：本地MAC是所有WTP必须支持的默认模式。启用隧道时（参见第4.6.43节），封装的帧必须采用802.3格式（参见第4.4.2节），除非无线管理或控制帧可能采用其本机格式。任何CAPWAP绑定都需要指定管理和控制无线帧的格式。

contents.text: 1 - Split MAC: Split MAC support is optional, and allows the AC to receive and process native wireless frames.
contents.zh-CHS: 1-分割MAC：分割MAC支持是可选的，允许AC接收和处理本机无线帧。

contents.text: 2 - Both: WTP is capable of supporting both Local MAC and Split MAC.
contents.zh-CHS: 2-两者：WTP能够同时支持本地MAC和拆分MAC。

contents.text: 4.6.45. WTP Name
contents.zh-CHS: 4.6.45. WTP名称

contents.text: The WTP Name message element is a variable-length byte UTF-8 encoded string [RFC3629]. The string is not zero terminated.
contents.zh-CHS: WTP名称消息元素是一个可变长度字节UTF-8编码字符串[RFC3629]。字符串不是以零结尾的。

contents.text: Type: 45 for WTP Name
contents.zh-CHS: 类型：45表示WTP名称

contents.text: Length:   >= 1
WTP Name: A non-zero-terminated UTF-8 encoded string [RFC3629] containing the WTP name, whose maximum size MUST NOT exceed 512 bytes.
contents.zh-CHS: WTP名称：包含WTP名称的非零终止UTF-8编码字符串[RFC3629]，其最大大小不得超过512字节。

contents.text: 4.6.46. WTP Radio Statistics
contents.zh-CHS: 4.6.46. WTP无线电统计

contents.text: The WTP Radio Statistics message element is sent by the WTP to the AC to communicate statistics on radio behavior and reasons why the WTP radio has been reset. These counters are never reset on the WTP, and will therefore roll over to zero when the maximum size has been reached.
contents.zh-CHS: WTP无线电统计信息元素由WTP发送至AC，以传达有关无线电行为的统计信息以及重置WTP无线电的原因。这些计数器永远不会在WTP上重置，因此，当达到最大大小时，将滚动到零。

contents.text: Type: 47 for WTP Radio Statistics
contents.zh-CHS: 类型：47用于WTP无线电统计

contents.text: Length: 20
contents.zh-CHS: 长度：20

contents.text: Radio ID: The radio ID of the radio to which the statistics apply, whose value is between one (1) and 31.
contents.zh-CHS: Radio ID：应用统计信息的收音机的收音机ID，其值介于一（1）和31之间。

contents.text: Last Failure Type: The last WTP failure. The following enumerated values are supported:
contents.zh-CHS: 上次故障类型：上次WTP故障。支持以下枚举值：

contents.text: 0 - Statistic Not Supported
contents.zh-CHS: 0-不支持统计信息

contents.text: 1 - Software Failure
contents.zh-CHS: 1-软件故障

contents.text: 2 - Hardware Failure
contents.zh-CHS: 2-硬件故障

contents.text: 3 - Other Failure
contents.zh-CHS: 3-其他故障

contents.text: 255 - Unknown (e.g., WTP doesn't keep track of info)
contents.zh-CHS: 255-未知（例如，WTP不跟踪信息）

contents.text: Reset Count: The number of times that the radio has been reset.
contents.zh-CHS: 重置计数：收音机已重置的次数。

contents.text: SW Failure Count: The number of times that the radio has failed due to software-related reasons.
contents.zh-CHS: SW Failure Count（软件故障计数）：由于软件相关原因导致无线电故障的次数。

contents.text: HW Failure Count: The number of times that the radio has failed due to hardware-related reasons.
contents.zh-CHS: 硬件故障计数：由于硬件相关原因导致收音机故障的次数。

contents.text: Other Failure Count: The number of times that the radio has failed due to known reasons, other than software or hardware failure.
contents.zh-CHS: 其他故障计数：由于已知原因（软件或硬件故障除外）导致收音机故障的次数。

contents.text: Unknown Failure Count: The number of times that the radio has failed for unknown reasons.
contents.zh-CHS: 未知故障计数：收音机因未知原因发生故障的次数。

contents.text: Config Update Count: The number of times that the radio configuration has been updated.
contents.zh-CHS: 配置更新计数：无线电配置已更新的次数。

contents.text: Channel Change Count: The number of times that the radio channel has been changed.
contents.zh-CHS: 频道更改计数：无线频道已更改的次数。

contents.text: Band Change Count: The number of times that the radio has changed frequency bands.
contents.zh-CHS: 频带更改计数：收音机更改频带的次数。

contents.text: Current Noise Floor: A signed integer that indicates the noise floor of the radio receiver in units of dBm.
contents.zh-CHS: 当前噪声下限：一个有符号整数，表示无线电接收机的噪声下限，单位为dBm。

contents.text: 4.6.47. WTP Reboot Statistics
contents.zh-CHS: 4.6.47. WTP重新启动统计信息

contents.text: The WTP Reboot Statistics message element is sent by the WTP to the AC to communicate reasons why WTP reboots have occurred. These counters are never reset on the WTP, and will therefore roll over to zero when the maximum size has been reached.
contents.zh-CHS: WTP向AC发送WTP重新启动统计信息元素，以说明发生WTP重新启动的原因。这些计数器永远不会在WTP上重置，因此，当达到最大大小时，将滚动到零。

contents.text: Type: 48 for WTP Reboot Statistics
contents.zh-CHS: 类型：48用于WTP重新启动统计信息

contents.text: Length: 15
contents.zh-CHS: 长度：15

contents.text: Reboot Count: The number of reboots that have occurred due to a WTP crash. A value of 65535 implies that this information is not available on the WTP.
contents.zh-CHS: 重新启动计数：由于WTP崩溃而发生的重新启动次数。值65535表示WTP上没有此信息。

contents.text: AC Initiated Count: The number of reboots that have occurred at the request of a CAPWAP protocol message, such as a change in configuration that required a reboot or an explicit CAPWAP protocol reset request. A value of 65535 implies that this information is not available on the WTP.
contents.zh-CHS: AC Initiated Count（AC Initiated Count）：请求CAPWAP协议消息时发生的重新启动次数，例如需要重新启动的配置更改或明确的CAPWAP协议重置请求。值65535表示WTP上没有此信息。

contents.text: Link Failure Count: The number of times that a CAPWAP protocol connection with an AC has failed due to link failure.
contents.zh-CHS: 链路故障计数：由于链路故障，与AC的CAPWAP协议连接失败的次数。

contents.text: SW Failure Count: The number of times that a CAPWAP protocol connection with an AC has failed due to software-related reasons.
contents.zh-CHS: SW Failure Count（软件故障计数）：由于软件相关原因，与AC的CAPWAP协议连接失败的次数。

contents.text: HW Failure Count: The number of times that a CAPWAP protocol connection with an AC has failed due to hardware-related reasons.
contents.zh-CHS: HW Failure Count（硬件故障计数）：由于硬件相关原因，与AC的CAPWAP协议连接失败的次数。

contents.text: Other Failure Count: The number of times that a CAPWAP protocol connection with an AC has failed due to known reasons, other than AC initiated, link, SW or HW failure.
contents.zh-CHS: 其他故障计数：由于已知原因（AC启动、链路、软件或硬件故障除外），与AC的CAPWAP协议连接失败的次数。

contents.text: Unknown Failure Count: The number of times that a CAPWAP protocol connection with an AC has failed for unknown reasons.
contents.zh-CHS: 未知失败计数：与AC的CAPWAP协议连接因未知原因失败的次数。

contents.text: Last Failure Type: The failure type of the most recent WTP failure. The following enumerated values are supported:
contents.zh-CHS: 上次故障类型：最近WTP故障的故障类型。支持以下枚举值：

contents.text: 0 - Not Supported
contents.zh-CHS: 0-不受支持

contents.text: 1 - AC Initiated (see Section 9.2)
contents.zh-CHS: 1-交流启动（见第9.2节）

contents.text: 2 - Link Failure
contents.zh-CHS: 2-链路故障

contents.text: 3 - Software Failure
contents.zh-CHS: 3-软件故障

contents.text: 4 - Hardware Failure
contents.zh-CHS: 4-硬件故障

contents.text: 5 - Other Failure
contents.zh-CHS: 5-其他故障

contents.text: 255 - Unknown (e.g., WTP doesn't keep track of info)
contents.zh-CHS: 255-未知（例如，WTP不跟踪信息）

contents.text: 4.6.48. WTP Static IP Address Information
contents.zh-CHS: 4.6.48. WTP静态IP地址信息

contents.text: The WTP Static IP Address Information message element is used by an AC to configure or clear a previously configured static IP address on a WTP. IPv6 WTPs are expected to use dynamic addresses.
contents.zh-CHS: AC使用WTP静态IP地址信息消息元素来配置或清除先前在WTP上配置的静态IP地址。IPv6 WTP应使用动态地址。

contents.text: Type: 49 for WTP Static IP Address Information
contents.zh-CHS: 类型：49用于WTP静态IP地址信息

contents.text: Length: 13
contents.zh-CHS: 长度：13

contents.text: IP Address: The IP address to assign to the WTP. This field is only valid if the static field is set to one.
contents.zh-CHS: IP地址：要分配给WTP的IP地址。仅当静态字段设置为1时，此字段才有效。

contents.text: Netmask: The IP Netmask. This field is only valid if the static field is set to one.
contents.zh-CHS: 网络掩码：IP网络掩码。仅当静态字段设置为1时，此字段才有效。

contents.text: Gateway: The IP address of the gateway. This field is only valid if the static field is set to one.
contents.zh-CHS: 网关：网关的IP地址。仅当静态字段设置为1时，此字段才有效。

contents.text: Static: An 8-bit Boolean stating whether or not the WTP should use a static IP address. A value of zero disables the static IP address, while a value of one enables it.
contents.zh-CHS: 静态：一个8位布尔值，说明WTP是否应使用静态IP地址。值为零将禁用静态IP地址，而值为1将启用静态IP地址。

contents.text: 4.7. CAPWAP Protocol Timers
contents.zh-CHS: 4.7. CAPWAP协议定时器

contents.text: This section contains the definition of the CAPWAP timers.
contents.zh-CHS: 本节包含CAPWAP定时器的定义。

contents.text: 4.7.1. ChangeStatePendingTimer
contents.zh-CHS: 4.7.1. ChangeStatePendingTimer

contents.text: The maximum time, in seconds, the AC will wait for the Change State Event Request from the WTP after having transmitted a successful Configuration Status Response message.
contents.zh-CHS: 在传输成功的配置状态响应消息后，AC将等待来自WTP的更改状态事件请求的最长时间（以秒为单位）。

contents.text: Default: 25 seconds
contents.zh-CHS: 默认值：25秒

contents.text: 4.7.2. DataChannelKeepAlive
contents.zh-CHS: 4.7.2. DataChannelKeepAlive

contents.text: The DataChannelKeepAlive timer is used by the WTP to determine the next opportunity when it must transmit the Data Channel Keep-Alive, in seconds.
contents.zh-CHS: WTP使用DataChannelKeepAlive计时器来确定下一次必须传输数据通道保持活动的机会，以秒为单位。

contents.text: Default: 30 seconds
contents.zh-CHS: 默认值：30秒

contents.text: 4.7.3. DataChannelDeadInterval
contents.zh-CHS: 4.7.3. 数据通道死区间隔

contents.text: The minimum time, in seconds, a WTP MUST wait without having received a Data Channel Keep-Alive packet before the destination for the Data Channel Keep-Alive packets may be considered dead. The value of this timer MUST be no less than 2*DataChannelKeepAlive seconds and no greater that 240 seconds.
contents.zh-CHS: WTP必须在没有接收到数据信道保持活动分组的情况下等待的最短时间（以秒为单位），然后数据信道保持活动分组的目的地才能被视为死亡。此计时器的值必须不小于2*DataChannelKeepAlive秒，且不大于240秒。

contents.text: Default: 60
contents.zh-CHS: 默认值：60

contents.text: 4.7.4. DataCheckTimer
contents.zh-CHS: 4.7.4. 数据校验计时器

contents.text: The number of seconds the AC will wait for the Data Channel Keep Alive, which is required by the CAPWAP state machine's Data Check state. The AC resets the state machine if this timer expires prior to transitioning to the next state.
contents.zh-CHS: AC等待数据通道保持活动的秒数，这是CAPWAP状态机的数据检查状态所要求的。如果此计时器在转换到下一个状态之前过期，AC将重置状态机。

contents.text: Default: 30
contents.zh-CHS: 默认值：30

contents.text: 4.7.5. DiscoveryInterval
contents.zh-CHS: 4.7.5. 发现间期

contents.text: The minimum time, in seconds, that a WTP MUST wait after receiving a Discovery Response message, before initiating a DTLS handshake.
contents.zh-CHS: WTP在接收到发现响应消息后，在启动DTLS握手之前必须等待的最短时间（秒）。

contents.text: Default: 5
contents.zh-CHS: 默认值：5

contents.text: 4.7.6. DTLSSessionDelete
contents.zh-CHS: 4.7.6. DTLSSessionDelete

contents.text: The minimum time, in seconds, a WTP MUST wait for DTLS session deletion.
contents.zh-CHS: WTP必须等待DTLS会话删除的最短时间（秒）。

contents.text: Default: 5
contents.zh-CHS: 默认值：5

contents.text: 4.7.7. EchoInterval
contents.zh-CHS: 4.7.7. 回声间隔

contents.text: The minimum time, in seconds, between sending Echo Request messages to the AC with which the WTP has joined.
contents.zh-CHS: 向WTP已加入的AC发送回显请求消息之间的最短时间（秒）。

contents.text: Default: 30
contents.zh-CHS: 默认值：30

contents.text: 4.7.8. IdleTimeout
contents.zh-CHS: 4.7.8. 空闲时间

contents.text: The default Idle Timeout is 300 seconds.
contents.zh-CHS: 默认空闲超时为300秒。

contents.text: 4.7.9. ImageDataStartTimer
contents.zh-CHS: 4.7.9. ImageDataStartTimer

contents.text: The number of seconds the WTP will wait for its peer to transmit the Image Data Request.
contents.zh-CHS: WTP等待其对等方发送图像数据请求的秒数。

contents.text: Default: 30
contents.zh-CHS: 默认值：30

contents.text: 4.7.10. MaxDiscoveryInterval
contents.zh-CHS: 4.7.10. MaxDiscoveryInterval

contents.text: The maximum time allowed between sending Discovery Request messages, in seconds. This value MUST be no less than 2 seconds and no greater than 180 seconds.
contents.zh-CHS: 发送发现请求消息之间允许的最长时间（秒）。该值必须不小于2秒且不大于180秒。

contents.text: Default: 20 seconds.
contents.zh-CHS: 默认值：20秒。

contents.text: 4.7.11. ReportInterval
The ReportInterval is used by the WTP to determine the interval the WTP uses between sending the Decryption Error message elements to inform the AC of decryption errors, in seconds.
contents.zh-CHS: WTP使用ReportInterval来确定WTP在发送解密错误消息元素以通知AC解密错误之间使用的时间间隔（以秒为单位）。

contents.text: The default Report Interval is 120 seconds.
contents.zh-CHS: 默认报告间隔为120秒。

contents.text: 4.7.12. RetransmitInterval
The minimum time, in seconds, in which a non-acknowledged CAPWAP packet will be retransmitted.
contents.zh-CHS: 重新传输未确认的CAPWAP数据包的最短时间（秒）。

contents.text: Default: 3
contents.zh-CHS: 默认值：3

contents.text: 4.7.13. SilentInterval

For a WTP, this is the minimum time, in seconds, a WTP MUST wait before it MAY again send Discovery Request messages or attempt to establish a DTLS session. For an AC, this is the minimum time, in seconds, during which the AC SHOULD ignore all CAPWAP and DTLS packets received from the WTP that is in the Sulking state.
contents.zh-CHS: 对于WTP，这是WTP在再次发送发现请求消息或尝试建立DTLS会话之前必须等待的最短时间（以秒为单位）。对于AC，这是AC应忽略从WTP接收的处于生气状态的所有CAPWAP和DTLS数据包的最短时间（以秒为单位）。

contents.text: Default: 30 seconds
contents.zh-CHS: 默认值：30秒

contents.text: 4.7.14. StatisticsTimer
contents.zh-CHS: 4.7.14. 统计计时器

contents.text: The StatisticsTimer is used by the WTP to determine the interval the WTP uses between the WTP Events Requests it transmits to the AC to communicate its statistics, in seconds.
contents.zh-CHS: WTP使用StatisticsTimer来确定WTP发送给AC的WTP事件请求之间的间隔，以秒为单位传达其统计信息。

contents.text: Default: 120 seconds
contents.zh-CHS: 默认值：120秒

contents.text: 4.7.15. WaitDTLS
The maximum time, in seconds, a WTP MUST wait without having received a DTLS Handshake message from an AC. This timer MUST be greater than 30 seconds.
contents.zh-CHS: WTP在没有收到来自AC的DTLS握手消息的情况下必须等待的最长时间（以秒为单位）。该计时器必须大于30秒。

contents.text: Default: 60
contents.zh-CHS: 默认值：60

contents.text: 4.7.16. WaitJoin
The maximum time, in seconds, an AC will wait after the DTLS session has been established until it receives the Join Request from the WTP. This timer MUST be greater than 20 seconds.
contents.zh-CHS: 在DTLS会话建立之后，AC将等待的最长时间（以秒为单位），直到它接收到来自WTP的加入请求。此计时器必须大于20秒。

contents.text: Default: 60
contents.zh-CHS: 默认值：60

contents.text: 4.8. CAPWAP Protocol Variables
contents.zh-CHS: 4.8. CAPWAP协议变量

contents.text: This section defines the CAPWAP protocol variables, which are used for various protocol functions. Some of these variables are configurable, while others are counters or have a fixed value. For non-counter-related variables, default values are specified. However, when a WTP's variable configuration is explicitly overridden by an AC, the WTP MUST save the new value.
contents.zh-CHS: 本节定义用于各种协议功能的CAPWAP协议变量。其中一些变量是可配置的，而其他变量是计数器或具有固定值。对于非计数器相关变量，将指定默认值。但是，当AC显式覆盖WTP的变量配置时，WTP必须保存新值。

contents.text: 4.8.1. AdminState
The default Administrative State value is enabled (1).
contents.zh-CHS: 默认管理状态值已启用（1）。

contents.text: 4.8.2. DiscoveryCount
contents.zh-CHS: 4.8.2. 发现计数

contents.text: The number of Discovery Request messages transmitted by a WTP to a single AC. This is a monotonically increasing counter.
contents.zh-CHS: WTP发送到单个AC的发现请求消息数。这是一个单调递增的计数器。

contents.text: 4.8.3. FailedDTLSAuthFailCount
contents.zh-CHS: 4.8.3. failedtlsauthfailcount

contents.text: The number of failed DTLS session establishment attempts due to authentication failures.
contents.zh-CHS: 由于身份验证失败而尝试建立DTLS会话失败的次数。

contents.text: 4.8.4. FailedDTLSSessionCount
contents.zh-CHS: 4.8.4. FailedDTLSessionCount

contents.text: The number of failed DTLS session establishment attempts.
contents.zh-CHS: DTLS会话建立尝试失败的次数。

contents.text: 4.8.5. MaxDiscoveries
contents.zh-CHS: 4.8.5. 马克斯发现

contents.text: The maximum number of Discovery Request messages that will be sent after a WTP boots.
contents.zh-CHS: WTP引导后将发送的最大发现请求消息数。

contents.text: Default: 10
contents.zh-CHS: 默认值：10

contents.text: 4.8.6. MaxFailedDTLSSessionRetry
contents.zh-CHS: 4.8.6. MaxFailedDTLSessionRetry

contents.text: The maximum number of failed DTLS session establishment attempts before the CAPWAP device enters a silent period.
contents.zh-CHS: CAPWAP设备进入静默期之前失败的DTLS会话建立尝试的最大次数。

contents.text: Default: 3
contents.zh-CHS: 默认值：3

contents.text: 4.8.7. MaxRetransmit
contents.zh-CHS: 4.8.7. 最大重传

contents.text: The maximum number of retransmissions for a given CAPWAP packet before the link layer considers the peer dead.
contents.zh-CHS: 链路层认为对等方已死亡之前，给定CAPWAP数据包的最大重传次数。

contents.text: Default: 5
contents.zh-CHS: 默认值：5

contents.text: 4.8.8. RetransmitCount
contents.zh-CHS: 4.8.8. 重传计数

contents.text: The number of retransmissions for a given CAPWAP packet. This is a monotonically increasing counter.
contents.zh-CHS: 给定CAPWAP数据包的重新传输次数。这是一个单调递增的计数器。

contents.text: 4.8.9. WTPFallBack
contents.zh-CHS: 4.8.9. WTPFallBack

contents.text: The default WTP Fallback value is enabled (1).
contents.zh-CHS: 默认WTP回退值已启用（1）。

contents.text: 4.9. WTP Saved Variables
contents.zh-CHS: 4.9. WTP保存的变量

contents.text: In addition to the values defined in Section 4.8, the following values SHOULD be saved on the WTP in non-volatile memory. CAPWAP wireless bindings MAY define additional values that SHOULD be stored on the WTP.
contents.zh-CHS: 除第4.8节中定义的值外，以下值应保存在非易失性存储器中的WTP上。CAPWAP无线绑定可定义应存储在WTP上的附加值。

contents.text: 4.9.1. AdminRebootCount
contents.zh-CHS: 4.9.1. 管理员人数

contents.text: The number of times the WTP has rebooted administratively, defined in Section 4.6.47.
contents.zh-CHS: WTP以管理方式重新启动的次数，如第4.6.47节所定义。

contents.text: 4.9.2. FrameEncapType
contents.zh-CHS: 4.9.2. 框架封装类型

contents.text: For WTPs that support multiple Frame Encapsulation Types, it is useful to save the value configured by the AC. The Frame Encapsulation Type is defined in Section 4.6.43.
contents.zh-CHS: 对于支持多种帧封装类型的WTP，保存AC配置的值非常有用。第4.6.43节定义了帧封装类型。

contents.text: 4.9.3. LastRebootReason
contents.zh-CHS: 4.9.3. 最后一个原因

contents.text: The reason why the WTP last rebooted, defined in Section 4.6.47.
contents.zh-CHS: WTP上次重新启动的原因，见第4.6.47节。

contents.text: 4.9.4. MacType
contents.zh-CHS: 4.9.4. MacType

contents.text: For WTPs that support multiple MAC-Types, it is useful to save the value configured by the AC. The MAC-Type is defined in Section 4.6.44.
contents.zh-CHS: 对于支持多种MAC类型的WTP，保存AC配置的值非常有用。MAC类型在第4.6.44节中定义。

contents.text: 4.9.5. PreferredACs
The preferred ACs, with the index, defined in Section 4.6.5.
contents.zh-CHS: 首选ACs，具有第4.6.5节中定义的索引。

contents.text: 4.9.6. RebootCount
contents.zh-CHS: 4.9.6. 重新登录计数

contents.text: The number of times the WTP has rebooted, defined in Section 4.6.47.
contents.zh-CHS: 第4.6.47节中定义的WTP重新启动的次数。

contents.text: 4.9.7. Static IP Address
contents.zh-CHS: 4.9.7. 静态IP地址

contents.text: The static IP address assigned to the WTP, as configured by the WTP Static IP address Information message element (see Section 4.6.48).
contents.zh-CHS: 分配给WTP的静态IP地址，由WTP静态IP地址信息消息元素配置（见第4.6.48节）。

contents.text: 4.9.8. WTPLinkFailureCount
contents.zh-CHS: 4.9.8. WTPLinkFailureCount

contents.text: The number of times the link to the AC has failed, see Section 4.6.47.
contents.zh-CHS: 连接至AC的链路发生故障的次数，见第4.6.47节。

contents.text: 4.9.9. WTPLocation
contents.zh-CHS: 4.9.9. WTPLocation

contents.text: The WTP Location, defined in Section 4.6.30.
contents.zh-CHS: 第4.6.30节中定义的水处理厂位置。

contents.text: 4.9.10. WTPName
contents.zh-CHS: 4.9.10. WTPName

contents.text: The WTP Name, defined in Section 4.6.45.
contents.zh-CHS: 第4.6.45节中定义的WTP名称。

contents.text: 5. CAPWAP Discovery Operations
contents.zh-CHS: 5. CAPWAP发现操作

contents.text: The Discovery messages are used by a WTP to determine which ACs are available to provide service, and the capabilities and load of the ACs.
contents.zh-CHS: WTP使用发现消息来确定哪些ACs可提供服务，以及ACs的能力和负载。

contents.text: 5.1. Discovery Request Message
contents.zh-CHS: 5.1. 发现请求消息

contents.text: The Discovery Request message is used by the WTP to automatically discover potential ACs available in the network. The Discovery Request message provides ACs with the primary capabilities of the
contents.zh-CHS: WTP使用发现请求消息自动发现网络中可用的潜在ACs。发现请求消息为ACs提供了

contents.text: WTP. A WTP must exchange this information to ensure subsequent exchanges with the ACs are consistent with the WTP's functional characteristics.
contents.zh-CHS: WTP。WTP必须交换此信息，以确保与ACs的后续交换符合WTP的功能特征。

contents.text: Discovery Request messages MUST be sent by a WTP in the Discover state after waiting for a random delay less than MaxDiscoveryInterval, after a WTP first comes up or is (re)initialized. A WTP MUST send no more than the maximum of MaxDiscoveries Discovery Request messages, waiting for a random delay less than MaxDiscoveryInterval between each successive message.
contents.zh-CHS: 在WTP首次出现或（重新）初始化后，等待小于MaxDiscoveryInterval的随机延迟后，发现请求消息必须由处于发现状态的WTP发送。WTP发送的消息不得超过MaxDiscoverys发现请求消息的最大值，等待每个连续消息之间小于MaxDiscoveryInterval的随机延迟。

contents.text: This is to prevent an explosion of WTP Discovery Request messages. An example of this occurring is when many WTPs are powered on at the same time.
contents.zh-CHS: 这是为了防止WTP发现请求消息爆炸。发生这种情况的一个例子是多个WTP同时通电。

contents.text: If a Discovery Response message is not received after sending the maximum number of Discovery Request messages, the WTP enters the Sulking state and MUST wait for an interval equal to SilentInterval before sending further Discovery Request messages.
contents.zh-CHS: 如果在发送最大数量的发现请求消息后未收到发现响应消息，WTP将进入生气状态，并且必须等待等于SilentInterval的间隔，然后再发送进一步的发现请求消息。

contents.text: Upon receiving a Discovery Request message, the AC will respond with a Discovery Response message sent to the address in the source address of the received Discovery Request message. Once a Discovery Response has been received, if the WTP decides to establish a session with the responding AC, it SHOULD perform an MTU discovery, using the process described in Section 3.5.
contents.zh-CHS: 在接收到发现请求消息后，AC将通过发送到接收到的发现请求消息的源地址中的地址的发现响应消息进行响应。一旦收到发现响应，如果WTP决定与响应的AC建立会话，则应使用第3.5节中描述的过程执行MTU发现。

contents.text: It is possible for the AC to receive a clear text Discovery Request message while a DTLS session is already active with the WTP. This is most likely the case if the WTP has rebooted, perhaps due to a software or power failure, but could also be caused by a DoS attack. In such cases, any WTP state, including the state machine instance, MUST NOT be cleared until another DTLS session has been successfully established, communicated via the DTLSSessionEstablished DTLS notification (see Section 2.3.2.2).
contents.zh-CHS: 当DTLS会话已与WTP激活时，AC可以接收明文发现请求消息。如果WTP已重新启动（可能是由于软件或电源故障），但也可能是由DoS攻击引起，则最有可能出现这种情况。在这种情况下，任何WTP状态（包括状态机实例）都不得清除，直到成功建立另一个DTLS会话，并通过DTLSSessionEstablished DTLS通知进行通信（见第2.3.2.2节）。

contents.text: The binding specific WTP Radio Information message element (see Section 2.1) is included in the Discovery Request message to advertise WTP support for one or more CAPWAP bindings.
contents.zh-CHS: 特定于绑定的WTP无线电信息消息元素（参见第2.1节）包含在查找请求消息中，用于公布一个或多个CAPWAP绑定的WTP支持。

contents.text: The Discovery Request message is sent by the WTP when in the Discovery state. The AC does not transmit this message.
contents.zh-CHS: WTP在发现状态下发送发现请求消息。空调不发送此信息。

contents.text: The following message elements MUST be included in the Discovery Request message:
contents.zh-CHS: 发现请求消息中必须包含以下消息元素：

contents.text: o Discovery Type, see Section 4.6.21
contents.zh-CHS: o 发现类型，见第4.6.21节

contents.text: o WTP Board Data, see Section 4.6.40
contents.zh-CHS: o WTP板数据，见第4.6.40节

contents.text: o WTP Descriptor, see Section 4.6.41
contents.zh-CHS: o WTP描述符，见第4.6.41节

contents.text: o WTP Frame Tunnel Mode, see Section 4.6.43
contents.zh-CHS: o WTP框架隧道模式，见第4.6.43节

contents.text: o WTP MAC Type, see Section 4.6.44
contents.zh-CHS: o WTP MAC类型，见第4.6.44节

contents.text: o WTP Radio Information message element(s) that the WTP supports; These are defined by the individual link layer CAPWAP Binding Protocols (see Section 2.1).
contents.zh-CHS: o WTP支持的WTP无线电信息消息元素；这些由各个链路层CAPWAP绑定协议定义（参见第2.1节）。

contents.text: The following message elements MAY be included in the Discovery Request message:
contents.zh-CHS: 发现请求消息中可能包括以下消息元素：

contents.text: o MTU Discovery Padding, see Section 4.6.32
contents.zh-CHS: o MTU发现填充，见第4.6.32节

contents.text: o Vendor Specific Payload, see Section 4.6.39
contents.zh-CHS: o 供应商特定有效载荷，见第4.6.39节

contents.text: 5.2. Discovery Response Message
contents.zh-CHS: 5.2. 发现响应消息

contents.text: The Discovery Response message provides a mechanism for an AC to advertise its services to requesting WTPs.
contents.zh-CHS: 发现响应消息为AC向请求的WTP公布其服务提供了一种机制。

contents.text: When a WTP receives a Discovery Response message, it MUST wait for an interval not less than DiscoveryInterval for receipt of additional Discovery Response messages. After the DiscoveryInterval elapses, the WTP enters the DTLS-Init state and selects one of the ACs that sent a Discovery Response message and send a DTLS Handshake to that AC.
contents.zh-CHS: 当WTP接收到发现响应消息时，它必须等待不小于DiscoveryInterval的间隔来接收其他发现响应消息。发现间隔过后，WTP进入DTLS初始状态，并选择发送发现响应消息并向该AC发送DTLS握手的ACs之一。

contents.text: One or more binding-specific WTP Radio Information message elements (see Section 2.1) are included in the Discovery Request message to advertise AC support for the CAPWAP bindings. The AC MAY include only the bindings it shares in common with the WTP, known through the WTP Radio Information message elements received in the Discovery Request message, or it MAY include all of the bindings supported. The WTP MAY use the supported bindings in its AC decision process. Note that if the WTP joins an AC that does not support a specific CAPWAP binding, service for that binding MUST NOT be provided by the WTP.
contents.zh-CHS: 发现请求消息中包含一个或多个特定于绑定的WTP无线电信息消息元素（请参见第2.1节），以公布对CAPWAP绑定的AC支持。AC可以仅包括其与WTP共享的绑定（通过在发现请求消息中接收的WTP无线电信息消息元素知道），或者它可以包括支持的所有绑定。WTP可以在其AC决策过程中使用受支持的绑定。请注意，如果WTP加入不支持特定CAPWAP绑定的AC，则WTP不得提供该绑定的服务。

contents.text: The Discovery Response message is sent by the AC when in the Idle state. The WTP does not transmit this message.
contents.zh-CHS: AC在空闲状态下发送发现响应消息。WTP不传输此消息。

contents.text: The following message elements MUST be included in the Discovery Response Message:
contents.zh-CHS: 发现响应消息中必须包含以下消息元素：

contents.text: o AC Descriptor, see Section 4.6.1
contents.zh-CHS: o 交流描述符，见第4.6.1节

contents.text: o AC Name, see Section 4.6.4
contents.zh-CHS: o AC名称，见第4.6.4节

contents.text: o WTP Radio Information message element(s) that the AC supports; these are defined by the individual link layer CAPWAP Binding Protocols (see Section 2.1 for more information).
contents.zh-CHS: o AC支持的WTP无线电信息消息元素；这些由各个链路层CAPWAP绑定协议定义（有关更多信息，请参阅第2.1节）。

contents.text: o One of the following message elements MUST be included in the Discovery Response Message:
contents.zh-CHS: o 发现响应消息中必须包含以下消息元素之一：

contents.text: * CAPWAP Control IPv4 Address, see Section 4.6.9
contents.zh-CHS: * CAPWAP控制IPv4地址，见第4.6.9节

contents.text: * CAPWAP Control IPv6 Address, see Section 4.6.10
contents.zh-CHS: * CAPWAP控制IPv6地址，见第4.6.10节

contents.text: The following message elements MAY be included in the Discovery Response message:
contents.zh-CHS: 发现响应消息中可能包括以下消息元素：

contents.text: o Vendor Specific Payload, see Section 4.6.39
contents.zh-CHS: o 供应商特定有效载荷，见第4.6.39节

contents.text: 5.3. Primary Discovery Request Message
contents.zh-CHS: 5.3. 主发现请求消息

contents.text: The Primary Discovery Request message is sent by the WTP to:
contents.zh-CHS: 主发现请求消息由WTP发送至：

contents.text: o determine whether its preferred (or primary) AC is available, or
contents.zh-CHS: o 确定其首选（或主要）AC是否可用，或

contents.text: o perform a Path MTU Discovery (see Section 3.5).
contents.zh-CHS: o 执行路径MTU发现（参见第3.5节）。

contents.text: A Primary Discovery Request message is sent by a WTP when it has a primary AC configured, and is connected to another AC. This generally occurs as a result of a failover, and is used by the WTP as a means to discover when its primary AC becomes available. Since the WTP only has a single instance of the CAPWAP state machine, the Primary Discovery Request is sent by the WTP when in the Run state. The AC does not transmit this message.
contents.zh-CHS: 当WTP配置了主AC时，主发现请求消息由WTP发送，并连接到另一个AC。这通常是故障切换的结果，WTP将此消息用作发现其主AC可用时的一种方法。由于WTP只有一个CAPWAP状态机实例，因此当处于运行状态时，WTP将发送主发现请求。空调不发送此信息。

contents.text: The frequency of the Primary Discovery Request messages should be no more often than the sending of the Echo Request message.
contents.zh-CHS: 主发现请求消息的频率不应超过发送回显请求消息的频率。

contents.text: Upon receipt of a Primary Discovery Request message, the AC responds with a Primary Discovery Response message sent to the address in the source address of the received Primary Discovery Request message.
contents.zh-CHS: 在接收到主发现请求消息后，AC使用发送到所接收的主发现请求消息的源地址中的地址的主发现响应消息进行响应。

contents.text: The following message elements MUST be included in the Primary Discovery Request message.
contents.zh-CHS: 主发现请求消息中必须包含以下消息元素。

contents.text: o Discovery Type, see Section 4.6.21
contents.zh-CHS: o 发现类型，见第4.6.21节

contents.text: o WTP Board Data, see Section 4.6.40
contents.zh-CHS: o WTP板数据，见第4.6.40节

contents.text: o WTP Descriptor, see Section 4.6.41
contents.zh-CHS: o WTP描述符，见第4.6.41节

contents.text: o WTP Frame Tunnel Mode, see Section 4.6.43
contents.zh-CHS: o WTP框架隧道模式，见第4.6.43节

contents.text: o WTP MAC Type, see Section 4.6.44
contents.zh-CHS: o WTP MAC类型，见第4.6.44节

contents.text: o WTP Radio Information message element(s) that the WTP supports; these are defined by the individual link layer CAPWAP Binding Protocols (see Section 2.1 for more information).
contents.zh-CHS: o WTP支持的WTP无线电信息消息元素；这些由各个链路层CAPWAP绑定协议定义（有关更多信息，请参阅第2.1节）。

contents.text: The following message elements MAY be included in the Primary Discovery Request message:
contents.zh-CHS: 主发现请求消息中可能包括以下消息元素：

contents.text: o MTU Discovery Padding, see Section 4.6.32
contents.zh-CHS: o MTU发现填充，见第4.6.32节

contents.text: o Vendor Specific Payload, see Section 4.6.39
contents.zh-CHS: o 供应商特定有效载荷，见第4.6.39节

contents.text: 5.4. Primary Discovery Response
contents.zh-CHS: 5.4. 主要发现响应

contents.text: The Primary Discovery Response message enables an AC to advertise its availability and services to requesting WTPs that are configured to have the AC as its primary AC.
contents.zh-CHS: 主发现响应消息使AC能够向请求的WTP公布其可用性和服务，这些WTP配置为将AC作为其主AC。

contents.text: The Primary Discovery Response message is sent by an AC after receiving a Primary Discovery Request message.
contents.zh-CHS: AC在收到主发现请求消息后发送主发现响应消息。

contents.text: When a WTP receives a Primary Discovery Response message, it may establish a CAPWAP protocol connection to its primary AC, based on the configuration of the WTP Fallback Status message element on the WTP.
contents.zh-CHS: 当WTP收到主发现响应消息时，它可以基于WTP上WTP回退状态消息元素的配置，建立与其主AC的CAPWAP协议连接。

contents.text: The Primary Discovery Response message is sent by the AC when in the Idle state. The WTP does not transmit this message.
contents.zh-CHS: AC在空闲状态下发送主发现响应消息。WTP不传输此消息。

contents.text: The following message elements MUST be included in the Primary Discovery Response message.
contents.zh-CHS: 主发现响应消息中必须包含以下消息元素。

contents.text: o AC Descriptor, see Section 4.6.1
contents.zh-CHS: o 交流描述符，见第4.6.1节

contents.text: o AC Name, see Section 4.6.4
contents.zh-CHS: o AC名称，见第4.6.4节

contents.text: o WTP Radio Information message element(s) that the AC supports; These are defined by the individual link layer CAPWAP Binding Protocols (see Section 2.1 for more information).
contents.zh-CHS: o AC支持的WTP无线电信息消息元素；这些由各个链路层CAPWAP绑定协议定义（有关更多信息，请参阅第2.1节）。

contents.text: One of the following message elements MUST be included in the Discovery Response Message:
contents.zh-CHS: 发现响应消息中必须包含以下消息元素之一：

contents.text: o CAPWAP Control IPv4 Address, see Section 4.6.9
contents.zh-CHS: o CAPWAP控制IPv4地址，见第4.6.9节

contents.text: o CAPWAP Control IPv6 Address, see Section 4.6.10
contents.zh-CHS: o CAPWAP控制IPv6地址，见第4.6.10节

contents.text: The following message elements MAY be included in the Primary Discovery Response message:
contents.zh-CHS: 主发现响应消息中可能包括以下消息元素：

contents.text: o Vendor Specific Payload, see Section 4.6.39
contents.zh-CHS: o 供应商特定有效载荷，见第4.6.39节

contents.text: 6. CAPWAP Join Operations
contents.zh-CHS: 6. CAPWAP加入操作

contents.text: The Join Request message is used by a WTP to request service from an AC after a DTLS connection is established to that AC. The Join Response message is used by the AC to indicate that it will or will not provide service.
contents.zh-CHS: 在与AC建立DTLS连接后，WTP使用加入请求消息从AC请求服务。AC使用加入响应消息指示其将提供或不提供服务。

contents.text: 6.1. Join Request
contents.zh-CHS: 6.1. 加入请求
