contents.text: The Join Request message is used by a WTP to request service through the AC. If the WTP is performing the optional AC Discovery process (see Section 3.3), the join process occurs after the WTP has received one or more Discovery Response messages. During the Discovery process, an AC MAY return more than one CAPWAP Control IPv4 Address or CAPWAP Control IPv6 Address message elements. When more than one such message element is returned, the WTP SHOULD perform "load balancing" by choosing the interface that is servicing the least number of WTPs (known through the WTP Count field of the message element). Note, however, that other load balancing algorithms are also permitted. Once the WTP has determined its preferred AC, and its associated interface, to which to connect, it establishes the DTLS session, and transmits the Join Request over the secured control channel. When an AC receives a Join Request message it responds with a Join Response message.
contents.zh-CHS: WTP使用加入请求消息通过AC请求服务。如果WTP正在执行可选的AC发现过程（参见第3.3节），则加入过程在WTP收到一个或多个发现响应消息后发生。在发现过程中，AC可能返回多个CAPWAP控制IPv4地址或CAPWAP控制IPv6地址消息元素。当返回多个这样的消息元素时，WTP应该通过选择为最少数量的WTP提供服务的接口（通过消息元素的WTP计数字段知道）来执行“负载平衡”。但是，请注意，也允许使用其他负载平衡算法。一旦WTP确定了要连接的首选AC及其相关接口，它将建立DTLS会话，并通过安全控制通道传输加入请求。当AC收到加入请求消息时，它会以加入响应消息进行响应。

contents.text: Upon completion of the DTLS handshake and receipt of the DTLSEstablished notification, the WTP sends the Join Request message to the AC. When the AC is notified of the DTLS session establishment, it does not clear the WaitDTLS timer until it has received the Join Request message, at which time it sends a Join Response message to the WTP, indicating success or failure.
contents.zh-CHS: DTLS握手完成并收到DTLSEstablished通知后，WTP向AC发送加入请求消息。当AC收到DTLS会话建立的通知时，它不会清除WaitDTLS计时器，直到它收到加入请求消息，此时它向WTP发送加入响应消息，表示成功或失败的。

contents.text: One or more WTP Radio Information message elements (see Section 2.1) are included in the Join Request to request service for the CAPWAP bindings by the AC. Including a binding that is unsupported by the AC will result in a failed Join Response.
contents.zh-CHS: AC为CAPWAP绑定请求服务的加入请求中包含一个或多个WTP无线电信息消息元素（参见第2.1节）。包括AC不支持的绑定将导致加入响应失败。

contents.text: If the AC rejects the Join Request, it sends a Join Response message with a failure indication and initiates an abort of the DTLS session via the DTLSAbort command.
contents.zh-CHS: 如果AC拒绝加入请求，它将发送带有故障指示的加入响应消息，并通过DTLSAbort命令启动DTLS会话的中止。

contents.text: If an invalid (i.e., malformed) Join Request message is received, the message MUST be silently discarded by the AC. No response is sent to the WTP. The AC SHOULD log this event.
contents.zh-CHS: 如果接收到无效（即格式不正确）的加入请求消息，AC必须悄悄地丢弃该消息。不会向WTP发送响应。AC应记录此事件。

contents.text: The Join Request is sent by the WTP when in the Join State. The AC does not transmit this message.
contents.zh-CHS: 连接请求在处于连接状态时由WTP发送。空调不发送此信息。

contents.text: The following message elements MUST be included in the Join Request message.
contents.zh-CHS: 加入请求消息中必须包含以下消息元素。

contents.text: o Location Data, see Section 4.6.30
contents.zh-CHS: o 位置数据，见第4.6.30节

contents.text: o WTP Board Data, see Section 4.6.40
contents.zh-CHS: o WTP板数据，见第4.6.40节

contents.text: o WTP Descriptor, see Section 4.6.41
contents.zh-CHS: o WTP描述符，见第4.6.41节

contents.text: o WTP Name, see Section 4.6.45
contents.zh-CHS: o 水处理厂名称，见第4.6.45节

contents.text: o Session ID, see Section 4.6.37
contents.zh-CHS: o 会话ID，见第4.6.37节

contents.text: o WTP Frame Tunnel Mode, see Section 4.6.43
contents.zh-CHS: o WTP框架隧道模式，见第4.6.43节

contents.text: o WTP MAC Type, see Section 4.6.44
contents.zh-CHS: o WTP MAC类型，见第4.6.44节

contents.text: o WTP Radio Information message element(s) that the WTP supports; these are defined by the individual link layer CAPWAP Binding Protocols (see Section 2.1 for more information).
contents.zh-CHS: o WTP支持的WTP无线电信息消息元素；这些由各个链路层CAPWAP绑定协议定义（有关更多信息，请参阅第2.1节）。

contents.text: o ECN Support, see Section 4.6.25
contents.zh-CHS: o ECN支持，见第4.6.25节

contents.text: At least one of the following message element MUST be included in the Join Request message.
contents.zh-CHS: 加入请求消息中必须至少包含以下消息元素之一。

contents.text: o CAPWAP Local IPv4 Address, see Section 4.6.11
contents.zh-CHS: o CAPWAP本地IPv4地址，见第4.6.11节

contents.text: o CAPWAP Local IPv6 Address, see Section 4.6.12
contents.zh-CHS: o CAPWAP本地IPv6地址，见第4.6.12节

contents.text: The following message element MAY be included in the Join Request message.
contents.zh-CHS: 加入请求消息中可能包含以下消息元素。

contents.text: o CAPWAP Transport Protocol, see Section 4.6.14
contents.zh-CHS: o CAPWAP传输协议，见第4.6.14节

contents.text: o Maximum Message Length, see Section 4.6.31
contents.zh-CHS: o 最大消息长度，见第4.6.31节

contents.text: o WTP Reboot Statistics, see Section 4.6.47
contents.zh-CHS: o WTP重启统计信息，见第4.6.47节

contents.text: o Vendor Specific Payload, see Section 4.6.39
contents.zh-CHS: o 供应商特定有效载荷，见第4.6.39节

contents.text: 6.2. Join Response
contents.zh-CHS: 6.2. 加入响应

contents.text: The Join Response message is sent by the AC to indicate to a WTP that it is capable and willing to provide service to the WTP.
contents.zh-CHS: 加入响应消息由AC发送，以向WTP指示其能够并且愿意向WTP提供服务。

contents.text: The WTP, receiving a Join Response message, checks for success or failure. If the message indicates success, the WTP clears the WaitDTLS timer for the session and proceeds to the Configure state.
contents.zh-CHS: WTP接收加入响应消息，检查成功或失败。如果消息指示成功，WTP将清除会话的WaitDTLS计时器并进入配置状态。

contents.text: If the WaitDTLS Timer expires prior to reception of the Join Response message, the WTP MUST terminate the handshake, deallocate session state and initiate the DTLSAbort command.
contents.zh-CHS: 如果WaitDTLS计时器在接收到加入响应消息之前过期，则WTP必须终止握手、取消分配会话状态并启动DTLSAbort命令。

contents.text: If an invalid (malformed) Join Response message is received, the WTP SHOULD log an informative message detailing the error. This error MUST be treated in the same manner as AC non-responsiveness. The WaitDTLS timer will eventually expire, and the WTP MAY (if it is so configured) attempt to join a new AC.
contents.zh-CHS: 如果收到无效（格式错误）的连接响应消息，WTP应记录详细说明错误的信息性消息。必须以与AC无响应性相同的方式处理此错误。WaitDTLS计时器最终将过期，WTP可能（如果已配置）尝试加入新的AC。

contents.text: If one of the WTP Radio Information message elements (see Section 2.1) in the Join Request message requested support for a CAPWAP binding that the AC does not support, the AC sets the Result Code message element to "Binding Not Supported".
contents.zh-CHS: 如果加入请求消息中的一个WTP无线电信息消息元素（参见第2.1节）请求支持AC不支持的CAPWAP绑定，AC将结果代码消息元素设置为“绑定不支持”。

contents.text: The AC includes the Image Identifier message element to indicate the software version it expects the WTP to run. This information is used to determine whether the WTP MUST change its currently running firmware image or download a new version (see Section 9.1.1).
contents.zh-CHS: AC包括图像标识符消息元素，以指示它期望WTP运行的软件版本。此信息用于确定WTP是否必须更改其当前运行的固件映像或下载新版本（请参阅第9.1.1节）。

contents.text: The Join Response message is sent by the AC when in the Join State. The WTP does not transmit this message.
contents.zh-CHS: 连接响应消息在连接状态下由AC发送。WTP不传输此消息。

contents.text: The following message elements MUST be included in the Join Response message.
contents.zh-CHS: 加入响应消息中必须包含以下消息元素。

contents.text: o Result Code, see Section 4.6.35
contents.zh-CHS: o 结果代码，见第4.6.35节

contents.text: o AC Descriptor, see Section 4.6.1
contents.zh-CHS: o 交流描述符，见第4.6.1节

contents.text: o AC Name, see Section 4.6.4
contents.zh-CHS: o AC名称，见第4.6.4节

contents.text: o WTP Radio Information message element(s) that the AC supports; these are defined by the individual link layer CAPWAP Binding Protocols (see Section 2.1).
contents.zh-CHS: o AC支持的WTP无线电信息消息元素；这些由各个链路层CAPWAP绑定协议定义（参见第2.1节）。

contents.text: o ECN Support, see Section 4.6.25
contents.zh-CHS: o ECN支持，见第4.6.25节

contents.text: One of the following message elements MUST be included in the Join Response Message:
contents.zh-CHS: 加入响应消息中必须包含以下消息元素之一：

contents.text: o CAPWAP Control IPv4 Address, see Section 4.6.9
contents.zh-CHS: o CAPWAP控制IPv4地址，见第4.6.9节

contents.text: o CAPWAP Control IPv6 Address, see Section 4.6.10
contents.zh-CHS: o CAPWAP控制IPv6地址，见第4.6.10节

contents.text: One of the following message elements MUST be included in the Join Response Message:
contents.zh-CHS: 加入响应消息中必须包含以下消息元素之一：

contents.text: o CAPWAP Local IPv4 Address, see Section 4.6.11
contents.zh-CHS: o CAPWAP本地IPv4地址，见第4.6.11节

contents.text: o CAPWAP Local IPv6 Address, see Section 4.6.12
contents.zh-CHS: o CAPWAP本地IPv6地址，见第4.6.12节

contents.text: The following message elements MAY be included in the Join Response message.
contents.zh-CHS: 加入响应消息中可能包含以下消息元素。

contents.text: o AC IPv4 List, see Section 4.6.2
contents.zh-CHS: o AC IPv4列表，见第4.6.2节

contents.text: o AC IPv6 List, see Section 4.6.3
contents.zh-CHS: o AC IPv6列表，见第4.6.3节

contents.text: o CAPWAP Transport Protocol, see Section 4.6.14
contents.zh-CHS: o CAPWAP传输协议，见第4.6.14节

contents.text: o Image Identifier, see Section 4.6.27
contents.zh-CHS: o 图像标识符，见第4.6.27节

contents.text: o Maximum Message Length, see Section 4.6.31
contents.zh-CHS: o 最大消息长度，见第4.6.31节

contents.text: o Vendor Specific Payload, see Section 4.6.39
contents.zh-CHS: o 供应商特定有效载荷，见第4.6.39节

contents.text: 7. Control Channel Management
contents.zh-CHS: 7. 控制通道管理

contents.text: The Control Channel Management messages are used by the WTP and AC to maintain a control communication channel. CAPWAP Control messages, such as the WTP Event Request message sent from the WTP to the AC indicate to the AC that the WTP is operational. When such control messages are not being sent, the Echo Request and Echo Response messages are used to maintain the control communication channel.
contents.zh-CHS: WTP和AC使用控制信道管理消息来维护控制通信信道。CAPWAP控制消息，例如从WTP发送到AC的WTP事件请求消息，向AC指示WTP正在运行。当不发送此类控制消息时，回显请求和回显响应消息用于维护控制通信信道。

contents.text: 7.1. Echo Request
contents.zh-CHS: 7.1. 回显请求

contents.text: The Echo Request message is a keep-alive mechanism for CAPWAP control messages.
contents.zh-CHS: Echo请求消息是CAPWAP控制消息的保持活动机制。

contents.text: Echo Request messages are sent periodically by a WTP in the Image Data or Run state (see Section 2.3) to determine the state of the control connection between the WTP and the AC. The Echo Request message is sent by the WTP when the EchoInterval timer expires.
contents.zh-CHS: WTP在图像数据或运行状态下（见第2.3节）定期发送回显请求消息，以确定WTP和AC之间控制连接的状态。回显请求消息在回显间隔计时器过期时由WTP发送。

contents.text: The Echo Request message is sent by the WTP when in the Run state. The AC does not transmit this message.
contents.zh-CHS: 当WTP处于运行状态时，将发送回显请求消息。空调不发送此信息。

contents.text: The following message elements MAY be included in the Echo Request message:
contents.zh-CHS: 回送请求消息中可能包括以下消息元素：

contents.text: o Vendor Specific Payload, see Section 4.6.39
contents.zh-CHS: o 供应商特定有效载荷，见第4.6.39节

contents.text: When an AC receives an Echo Request message it responds with an Echo Response message.
contents.zh-CHS: 当AC收到回音请求消息时，它会以回音响应消息进行响应。

contents.text: 7.2. Echo Response
contents.zh-CHS: 7.2. 回声响应

contents.text: The Echo Response message acknowledges the Echo Request message.
contents.zh-CHS: 回显响应消息确认回显请求消息。

contents.text: An Echo Response message is sent by an AC after receiving an Echo Request message. After transmitting the Echo Response message, the AC SHOULD reset its EchoInterval timer (see Section 4.7.7). If another Echo Request message or other control message is not received by the AC when the timer expires, the AC SHOULD consider the WTP to be no longer reachable.
contents.zh-CHS: AC在接收回显请求消息后发送回显响应消息。在发送回声响应信息后，AC应重置其回声间隔计时器（见第4.7.7节）。如果在定时器到期时AC没有接收到另一个回声请求消息或其他控制消息，则AC应该考虑WTP不再可到达。

contents.text: The Echo Response message is sent by the AC when in the Run state. The WTP does not transmit this message.
contents.zh-CHS: 当AC处于运行状态时，会发送回显响应消息。WTP不传输此消息。

contents.text: The following message elements MAY be included in the Echo Response message:
contents.zh-CHS: 回声响应消息中可能包括以下消息元素：

contents.text: o Vendor Specific Payload, see Section 4.6.39
contents.zh-CHS: o 供应商特定有效载荷，见第4.6.39节

contents.text: When a WTP receives an Echo Response message it initializes the EchoInterval to the configured value.
contents.zh-CHS: 当WTP收到回音响应消息时，它会将回音间隔初始化为配置的值。

contents.text: 8. WTP Configuration Management
contents.zh-CHS: 8. WTP配置管理

contents.text: WTP Configuration messages are used to exchange configuration information between the AC and the WTP.
contents.zh-CHS: WTP配置消息用于在AC和WTP之间交换配置信息。

contents.text: 8.1. Configuration Consistency
contents.zh-CHS: 8.1. 配置一致性

contents.text: The CAPWAP protocol provides flexibility in how WTP configuration is managed. A WTP can behave in one of two ways, which is implementation specific:
contents.zh-CHS: CAPWAP协议在如何管理WTP配置方面提供了灵活性。WTP可以采用以下两种方式之一，这是特定于实现的：

contents.text: 1. The WTP retains no configuration and accepts the configuration provided by the AC.
contents.zh-CHS: 1. WTP不保留任何配置，并接受AC提供的配置。

contents.text: 2. The WTP saves the configuration of parameters provided by the AC that are non-default values into local non-volatile memory, and are enforced during the WTP's power up initialization phase.
contents.zh-CHS: 2. WTP将AC提供的非默认值参数配置保存到本地非易失性内存中，并在WTP通电初始化阶段强制执行。

contents.text: If the WTP opts to save configuration locally, the CAPWAP protocol state machine defines the Configure state, which allows for configuration exchange. In the Configure state, the WTP sends its current configuration overrides to the AC via the Configuration Status Request message. A configuration override is a non-default parameter. As an example, in the CAPWAP protocol, the default antenna configuration is internal omni antenna. A WTP that either has no internal antennas, or has been explicitly configured by the AC to use external antennas, sends its antenna configuration during the configure phase, allowing the AC to become aware of the WTP's current configuration.
contents.zh-CHS: 如果WTP选择在本地保存配置，CAPWAP协议状态机将定义允许配置交换的配置状态。在配置状态下，WTP通过配置状态请求消息向AC发送其当前配置覆盖。配置替代是非默认参数。例如，在CAPWAP协议中，默认天线配置为内部全向天线。没有内部天线或已被AC明确配置为使用外部天线的WTP在配置阶段发送其天线配置，从而允许AC了解WTP的当前配置。

contents.text: Once the WTP has provided its configuration to the AC, the AC sends its configuration to the WTP. This allows the WTP to receive configuration and policies from the AC.
contents.zh-CHS: 一旦WTP向AC提供了其配置，AC将其配置发送给WTP。这允许WTP从AC接收配置和策略。

contents.text: The AC maintains a copy of each active WTP configuration. There is no need for versioning or other means to identify configuration changes. If a WTP becomes inactive, the AC MAY delete the inactive WTP configuration. If a WTP fails, and connects to a new AC, the WTP provides its overridden configuration parameters, allowing the new AC to be aware of the WTP configuration.
contents.zh-CHS: AC维护每个活动WTP配置的副本。不需要版本控制或其他方法来识别配置更改。如果WTP变为非活动状态，AC可删除非活动WTP配置。如果WTP发生故障并连接到新的AC，WTP将提供其覆盖的配置参数，使新AC能够了解WTP配置。

contents.text: This model allows for resiliency in case of an AC failure, ensuring another AC can provide service to the WTP. A new AC would be automatically updated with WTP configuration changes, eliminating the need for inter-AC communication and the need for all ACs to be aware of the configuration of all WTPs in the network.
contents.zh-CHS: 该模型允许在AC故障情况下恢复，确保另一个AC可以向WTP提供服务。新的AC将随着WTP配置的更改而自动更新，从而消除AC间通信的需要以及所有AC了解网络中所有WTP配置的需要。

contents.text: Once the CAPWAP protocol enters the Run state, the WTPs begin to provide service. It is common for administrators to require that configuration changes be made while the network is operational. Therefore, the Configuration Update Request is sent by the AC to the WTP to make these changes at run-time.
contents.zh-CHS: 一旦CAPWAP协议进入运行状态，WTP就开始提供服务。管理员通常要求在网络运行时更改配置。因此，AC向WTP发送配置更新请求，以便在运行时进行这些更改。

contents.text: 8.1.1. Configuration Flexibility
contents.zh-CHS: 8.1.1. 配置灵活性

contents.text: The CAPWAP protocol provides the flexibility to configure and manage WTPs of varying design and functional characteristics. When a WTP first discovers an AC, it provides primary functional information
contents.zh-CHS: CAPWAP协议提供了配置和管理具有不同设计和功能特征的WTP的灵活性。当WTP首次发现AC时，它提供主要功能信息

contents.text: relating to its type of MAC and to the nature of frames to be exchanged. The AC configures the WTP appropriately. The AC also establishes corresponding internal state for the WTP.
contents.zh-CHS: 与MAC的类型和要交换的帧的性质有关。AC适当地配置WTP。AC还为WTP建立相应的内部状态。

contents.text: 8.2. Configuration Status Request
contents.zh-CHS: 8.2. 配置状态请求

contents.text: The Configuration Status Request message is sent by a WTP to deliver its current configuration to the AC.
contents.zh-CHS: 配置状态请求消息由WTP发送，以将其当前配置传递给AC。

contents.text: The Configuration Status Request message carries binding-specific message elements. Refer to the appropriate binding for the definition of this structure.
contents.zh-CHS: 配置状态请求消息包含绑定特定的消息元素。有关此结构的定义，请参阅相应的绑定。

contents.text: When an AC receives a Configuration Status Request message, it acts upon the content of the message and responds to the WTP with a Configuration Status Response message.
contents.zh-CHS: 当AC接收到配置状态请求消息时，它根据消息的内容采取行动，并使用配置状态响应消息响应WTP。

contents.text: The Configuration Status Request message includes multiple Radio Administrative State message elements, one for the WTP, and one for each radio in the WTP.
contents.zh-CHS: 配置状态请求消息包括多个无线电管理状态消息元素，一个用于WTP，另一个用于WTP中的每个无线电。

contents.text: The Configuration Status Request message is sent by the WTP when in the Configure State. The AC does not transmit this message.
contents.zh-CHS: 配置状态请求消息在处于配置状态时由WTP发送。空调不发送此信息。

contents.text: The following message elements MUST be included in the Configuration Status Request message.
contents.zh-CHS: 配置状态请求消息中必须包含以下消息元素。

contents.text: o AC Name, see Section 4.6.4
contents.zh-CHS: o AC名称，见第4.6.4节

contents.text: o Radio Administrative State, see Section 4.6.33
contents.zh-CHS: o 无线电管理状态，见第4.6.33节

contents.text: o Statistics Timer, see Section 4.6.38
contents.zh-CHS: o 统计计时器，见第4.6.38节

contents.text: o WTP Reboot Statistics, see Section 4.6.47
contents.zh-CHS: o WTP重启统计信息，见第4.6.47节

contents.text: The following message elements MAY be included in the Configuration Status Request message.
contents.zh-CHS: 配置状态请求消息中可能包含以下消息元素。

contents.text: o AC Name with Priority, see Section 4.6.5
contents.zh-CHS: o 具有优先权的AC名称，见第4.6.5节

contents.text: o CAPWAP Transport Protocol, see Section 4.6.14
contents.zh-CHS: o CAPWAP传输协议，见第4.6.14节

contents.text: o WTP Static IP Address Information, see Section 4.6.48
contents.zh-CHS: o WTP静态IP地址信息，见第4.6.48节

contents.text: o Vendor Specific Payload, see Section 4.6.39
contents.zh-CHS: o 供应商特定有效载荷，见第4.6.39节

contents.text: 8.3. Configuration Status Response
contents.zh-CHS: 8.3. 配置状态响应

contents.text: The Configuration Status Response message is sent by an AC and provides a mechanism for the AC to override a WTP's requested configuration.
contents.zh-CHS: 配置状态响应消息由AC发送，并为AC提供覆盖WTP请求的配置的机制。

contents.text: A Configuration Status Response message is sent by an AC after receiving a Configuration Status Request message.
contents.zh-CHS: AC在收到配置状态请求消息后发送配置状态响应消息。

contents.text: The Configuration Status Response message carries binding-specific message elements. Refer to the appropriate binding for the definition of this structure.
contents.zh-CHS: 配置状态响应消息包含绑定特定的消息元素。有关此结构的定义，请参阅相应的绑定。

contents.text: When a WTP receives a Configuration Status Response message, it acts upon the content of the message, as appropriate. If the Configuration Status Response message includes a Radio Operational State message element that causes a change in the operational state of one of the radios, the WTP transmits a Change State Event to the AC, as an acknowledgement of the change in state.
contents.zh-CHS: 当WTP收到配置状态响应消息时，它会根据消息的内容（视情况而定）进行操作。如果配置状态响应消息包括导致其中一个无线电的操作状态改变的无线电操作状态消息元素，则WTP向AC发送改变状态事件，作为对状态改变的确认。

contents.text: The Configuration Status Response message is sent by the AC when in the Configure state. The WTP does not transmit this message.
contents.zh-CHS: 配置状态响应消息由AC在配置状态下发送。WTP不传输此消息。

contents.text: The following message elements MUST be included in the Configuration Status Response message.
contents.zh-CHS: 配置状态响应消息中必须包含以下消息元素。

contents.text: o CAPWAP Timers, see Section 4.6.13
contents.zh-CHS: o CAPWAP定时器，见第4.6.13节

contents.text: o Decryption Error Report Period, see Section 4.6.18
contents.zh-CHS: o 解密错误报告期，见第4.6.18节

contents.text: o Idle Timeout, see Section 4.6.24
contents.zh-CHS: o 空闲超时，见第4.6.24节

contents.text: o WTP Fallback, see Section 4.6.42
contents.zh-CHS: o WTP回退，见第4.6.42节

contents.text: One or both of the following message elements MUST be included in the Configuration Status Response message:
contents.zh-CHS: 配置状态响应消息中必须包含以下一个或两个消息元素：

contents.text: o AC IPv4 List, see Section 4.6.2
contents.zh-CHS: o AC IPv4列表，见第4.6.2节

contents.text: o AC IPv6 List, see Section 4.6.3
contents.zh-CHS: o AC IPv6列表，见第4.6.3节

contents.text: The following message element MAY be included in the Configuration Status Response message.
contents.zh-CHS: 配置状态响应消息中可能包含以下消息元素。

contents.text: o WTP Static IP Address Information, see Section 4.6.48
contents.zh-CHS: o WTP静态IP地址信息，见第4.6.48节

contents.text: o Vendor Specific Payload, see Section 4.6.39
contents.zh-CHS: o 供应商特定有效载荷，见第4.6.39节

contents.text: 8.4. Configuration Update Request
contents.zh-CHS: 8.4. 配置更新请求

contents.text: Configuration Update Request messages are sent by the AC to provision the WTP while in the Run state. This is used to modify the configuration of the WTP while it is operational.
contents.zh-CHS: AC在运行状态下发送配置更新请求消息，以提供WTP。这用于在WTP运行时修改其配置。

contents.text: When a WTP receives a Configuration Update Request message, it responds with a Configuration Update Response message, with a Result Code message element indicating the result of the configuration request.
contents.zh-CHS: 当WTP收到配置更新请求消息时，它用配置更新响应消息进行响应，结果代码消息元素指示配置请求的结果。

contents.text: The AC includes the Image Identifier message element (see Section 4.6.27) to force the WTP to update its firmware while in the Run state. The WTP MAY proceed to download the requested firmware if it determines the version specified in the Image Identifier message element is not in its non-volatile storage by transmitting an Image Data Request (see Section 9.1.1) that includes the Initiate Download message element (see Section 4.6.29).
contents.zh-CHS: AC包括图像标识符消息元素（见第4.6.27节），以强制WTP在运行状态下更新其固件。如果WTP通过发送包含启动下载消息元素（参见第4.6.29节）的图像数据请求（参见第9.1.1节）确定图像标识符消息元素中指定的版本不在其非易失性存储器中，则WTP可以继续下载请求的固件。

contents.text: The Configuration Update Request is sent by the AC when in the Run state. The WTP does not transmit this message.
contents.zh-CHS: AC在运行状态下发送配置更新请求。WTP不传输此消息。

contents.text: One or more of the following message elements MAY be included in the Configuration Update message:
contents.zh-CHS: 配置更新消息中可能包括以下一个或多个消息元素：

contents.text: o AC Name with Priority, see Section 4.6.5
contents.zh-CHS: o 具有优先权的AC名称，见第4.6.5节

contents.text: o AC Timestamp, see Section 4.6.6
contents.zh-CHS: o AC时间戳，见第4.6.6节

contents.text: o Add MAC ACL Entry, see Section 4.6.7
contents.zh-CHS: o 添加MAC ACL条目，见第4.6.7节

contents.text: o CAPWAP Timers, see Section 4.6.13
contents.zh-CHS: o CAPWAP定时器，见第4.6.13节

contents.text: o Decryption Error Report Period, see Section 4.6.18
contents.zh-CHS: o 解密错误报告期，见第4.6.18节

contents.text: o Delete MAC ACL Entry, see Section 4.6.19
contents.zh-CHS: o 删除MAC ACL条目，见第4.6.19节

contents.text: o Idle Timeout, see Section 4.6.24
contents.zh-CHS: o 空闲超时，见第4.6.24节

contents.text: o Location Data, see Section 4.6.30
contents.zh-CHS: o 位置数据，见第4.6.30节

contents.text: o Radio Administrative State, see Section 4.6.33
contents.zh-CHS: o 无线电管理状态，见第4.6.33节

contents.text: o Statistics Timer, see Section 4.6.38
contents.zh-CHS: o 统计计时器，见第4.6.38节

contents.text: o WTP Fallback, see Section 4.6.42
contents.zh-CHS: o WTP回退，见第4.6.42节

contents.text: o WTP Name, see Section 4.6.45
contents.zh-CHS: o 水处理厂名称，见第4.6.45节

contents.text: o WTP Static IP Address Information, see Section 4.6.48
contents.zh-CHS: o WTP静态IP地址信息，见第4.6.48节

contents.text: o Image Identifier, see Section 4.6.27
contents.zh-CHS: o 图像标识符，见第4.6.27节

contents.text: o Vendor Specific Payload, see Section 4.6.39
contents.zh-CHS: o 供应商特定有效载荷，见第4.6.39节

contents.text: 8.5. Configuration Update Response
contents.zh-CHS: 8.5. 配置更新响应

contents.text: The Configuration Update Response message is the acknowledgement message for the Configuration Update Request message.
contents.zh-CHS: 配置更新响应消息是配置更新请求消息的确认消息。

contents.text: The Configuration Update Response message is sent by a WTP after receiving a Configuration Update Request message.
contents.zh-CHS: 配置更新响应消息由WTP在接收到配置更新请求消息后发送。

contents.text: When an AC receives a Configuration Update Response message, the result code indicates if the WTP successfully accepted the configuration.
contents.zh-CHS: 当AC收到配置更新响应消息时，结果代码指示WTP是否成功接受配置。

contents.text: The Configuration Update Response message is sent by the WTP when in the Run state. The AC does not transmit this message.
contents.zh-CHS: WTP在运行状态下发送配置更新响应消息。空调不发送此信息。

contents.text: The following message element MUST be present in the Configuration Update message.
contents.zh-CHS: 配置更新消息中必须存在以下消息元素。

contents.text: Result Code, see Section 4.6.35
contents.zh-CHS: 结果代码，见第4.6.35节

contents.text: The following message elements MAY be present in the Configuration Update Response message.
contents.zh-CHS: 配置更新响应消息中可能存在以下消息元素。

contents.text: o Radio Operational State, see Section 4.6.34
contents.zh-CHS: o 无线电工作状态，见第4.6.34节

contents.text: o Vendor Specific Payload, see Section 4.6.39
contents.zh-CHS: o 供应商特定有效载荷，见第4.6.39节

contents.text: 8.6. Change State Event Request
contents.zh-CHS: 8.6. 更改状态事件请求

contents.text: The Change State Event Request message is used by the WTP for two main purposes:
contents.zh-CHS: WTP将更改状态事件请求消息用于两个主要目的：

contents.text: o When sent by the WTP following the reception of a Configuration Status Response message from the AC, the WTP uses the Change State Event Request message to provide an update on the WTP radio's operational state and to confirm that the configuration provided by the AC was successfully applied.
contents.zh-CHS: o 当WTP在收到来自AC的配置状态响应消息后发送时，WTP使用更改状态事件请求消息提供WTP无线电操作状态的更新，并确认AC提供的配置已成功应用。

contents.text: o When sent during the Run state, the WTP uses the Change State Event Request message to notify the AC of an unexpected change in the WTP's radio operational state.
contents.zh-CHS: o 在运行状态期间发送时，WTP使用更改状态事件请求消息通知AC WTP无线电操作状态的意外更改。

contents.text: When an AC receives a Change State Event Request message it responds with a Change State Event Response message and modifies its data structures for the WTP as needed. The AC MAY decide not to provide service to the WTP if it receives an error, based on local policy, and to transition to the Reset state.
contents.zh-CHS: 当AC收到变更状态事件请求消息时，它会使用变更状态事件响应消息进行响应，并根据需要修改WTP的数据结构。如果AC收到错误，则AC可根据本地策略决定不向WTP提供服务，并转换到重置状态。

contents.text: The Change State Event Request message is sent by a WTP to acknowledge or report an error condition to the AC for a requested configuration in the Configuration Status Response message. The Change State Event Request message includes the Result Code message element, which indicates whether the configuration was successfully applied. If the WTP is unable to apply a specific configuration request, it indicates the failure by including one or more Returned Message Element message elements (see Section 4.6.36).
contents.zh-CHS: 变更状态事件请求消息由WTP发送，以确认或向AC报告配置状态响应消息中请求配置的错误情况。更改状态事件请求消息包含结果代码消息元素，该元素指示配置是否已成功应用。如果WTP无法应用特定的配置请求，则通过包含一个或多个返回的消息元素（参见第4.6.36节）来指示故障。

contents.text: The Change State Event Request message is sent by the WTP in the Configure or Run state. The AC does not transmit this message.
contents.zh-CHS: 更改状态事件请求消息由WTP在配置或运行状态下发送。空调不发送此信息。

contents.text: The WTP MAY save its configuration to persistent storage prior to transmitting the response. However, this is implementation specific and is not required.
contents.zh-CHS: WTP可以在发送响应之前将其配置保存到持久存储器。但是，这是特定于实现的，不是必需的。

contents.text: The following message elements MUST be present in the Change State Event Request message.
contents.zh-CHS: 更改状态事件请求消息中必须存在以下消息元素。

contents.text: o Radio Operational State, see Section 4.6.34
contents.zh-CHS: o 无线电工作状态，见第4.6.34节

contents.text: o Result Code, see Section 4.6.35
contents.zh-CHS: o 结果代码，见第4.6.35节

contents.text: One or more of the following message elements MAY be present in the Change State Event Request message:
contents.zh-CHS: 更改状态事件请求消息中可能存在以下一个或多个消息元素：

contents.text: o Returned Message Element(s), see Section 4.6.36
contents.zh-CHS: o 返回的消息元素，见第4.6.36节

contents.text: o Vendor Specific Payload, see Section 4.6.39
contents.zh-CHS: o 供应商特定有效载荷，见第4.6.39节

contents.text: 8.7. Change State Event Response
contents.zh-CHS: 8.7. 更改状态事件响应

contents.text: The Change State Event Response message acknowledges the Change State Event Request message.
contents.zh-CHS: 变更状态事件响应消息确认变更状态事件请求消息。

contents.text: A Change State Event Response message is sent by an AC in response to a Change State Event Request message.
contents.zh-CHS: 变更状态事件响应消息由AC发送，以响应变更状态事件请求消息。

contents.text: The Change State Event Response message is sent by the AC when in the Configure or Run state. The WTP does not transmit this message.
contents.zh-CHS: 处于配置或运行状态时，AC将发送更改状态事件响应消息。WTP不传输此消息。

contents.text: The following message element MAY be included in the Change State Event Response message:
contents.zh-CHS: 更改状态事件响应消息中可能包含以下消息元素：

contents.text: o Vendor Specific Payload, see Section 4.6.39
contents.zh-CHS: o 供应商特定有效载荷，见第4.6.39节

contents.text: The WTP does not take any action upon receipt of the Change State Event Response message.
contents.zh-CHS: WTP在收到变更状态事件响应消息后不采取任何行动。

contents.text: 8.8. Clear Configuration Request
contents.zh-CHS: 8.8. 清除配置请求

contents.text: The Clear Configuration Request message is used to reset the WTP configuration.
contents.zh-CHS: 清除配置请求消息用于重置WTP配置。

contents.text: The Clear Configuration Request message is sent by an AC to request that a WTP reset its configuration to the manufacturing default configuration. The Clear Config Request message is sent while in the Run state.
contents.zh-CHS: 清除配置请求消息由AC发送，请求WTP将其配置重置为制造默认配置。清除配置请求消息在处于运行状态时发送。

contents.text: The Clear Configuration Request is sent by the AC when in the Run state. The WTP does not transmit this message.
contents.zh-CHS: 在运行状态下，AC发送清除配置请求。WTP不传输此消息。

contents.text: The following message element MAY be included in the Clear Configuration Request message:
contents.zh-CHS: 清除配置请求消息中可能包含以下消息元素：

contents.text: o Vendor Specific Payload, see Section 4.6.39
contents.zh-CHS: o 供应商特定有效载荷，见第4.6.39节

contents.text: When a WTP receives a Clear Configuration Request message, it resets its configuration to the manufacturing default configuration.
contents.zh-CHS: 当WTP收到清除配置请求消息时，它将其配置重置为制造默认配置。

contents.text: 8.9. Clear Configuration Response
contents.zh-CHS: 8.9. 清晰的配置响应

contents.text: The Clear Configuration Response message is sent by the WTP after receiving a Clear Configuration Request message and resetting its configuration parameters to the manufacturing default values.
contents.zh-CHS: 在接收到清除配置请求消息并将其配置参数重置为制造默认值后，WTP发送清除配置响应消息。

contents.text: The Clear Configuration Response is sent by the WTP when in the Run state. The AC does not transmit this message.
contents.zh-CHS: 处于运行状态时，WTP将发送清除配置响应。空调不发送此信息。

contents.text: The Clear Configuration Response message MUST include the following message element:
contents.zh-CHS: 清除配置响应消息必须包括以下消息元素：

contents.text: o Result Code, see Section 4.6.35
contents.zh-CHS: o 结果代码，见第4.6.35节

contents.text: The following message element MAY be included in the Clear Configuration Request message:
contents.zh-CHS: 清除配置请求消息中可能包含以下消息元素：

contents.text: o Vendor Specific Payload, see Section 4.6.39
contents.zh-CHS: o 供应商特定有效载荷，见第4.6.39节

contents.text: 9. Device Management Operations
contents.zh-CHS: 9. 设备管理操作

contents.text: This section defines CAPWAP operations responsible for debugging, gathering statistics, logging, and firmware management. The management operations defined in this section are used by the AC to either push/pull information to/from the WTP, or request that the WTP reboot. This section does not deal with the management of the AC per se, and assumes that the AC is operational and configured.
contents.zh-CHS: 本节定义了负责调试、收集统计信息、日志记录和固件管理的CAPWAP操作。AC使用本节中定义的管理操作向WTP推送/从WTP拉取信息，或请求WTP重新启动。本节不涉及空调本身的管理，并假设空调可以运行和配置。

contents.text: 9.1. Firmware Management
contents.zh-CHS: 9.1. 固件管理

contents.text: This section describes the firmware download procedures used by the CAPWAP protocol. Firmware download can occur during the Image Data or Run state. The former allows the download to occur at boot time, while the latter is used to trigger the download while an active CAPWAP session exists. It is important to note that the CAPWAP protocol does not provide the ability for the AC to identify whether the firmware information provided by the WTP is correct or whether the WTP is properly storing the firmware (see Section 12.10 for more information).
contents.zh-CHS: 本节介绍CAPWAP协议使用的固件下载过程。固件下载可在映像数据或运行状态期间进行。前者允许在启动时进行下载，而后者用于在活动CAPWAP会话存在时触发下载。需要注意的是，CAPWAP协议不提供AC识别WTP提供的固件信息是否正确或WTP是否正确存储固件的能力（有关更多信息，请参阅第12.10节）。

contents.text: Figure 6 provides an example of a WTP that performs a firmware upgrade while in the Image Data state. In this example, the WTP does not already have the requested firmware (Image Identifier = x), and downloads the image from the AC.
contents.zh-CHS: 图6提供了在映像数据状态下执行固件升级的WTP示例。在此示例中，WTP尚未具有请求的固件（映像标识符=x），并从AC下载映像。

contents.text: WTP AC
contents.zh-CHS: 水处理厂空调

contents.text:

contents.zh-CHS: 图7提供了一个示例，其中WTP在其非易失性存储器中具有AC指定的映像，但不是其当前运行的映像。在这种情况下，WTP选择不下载固件，并立即重置为请求的映像。

This mode of firmware upgrade allows the WTP to download its image while continuing to provide service. The WTP will not automatically reset until it is notified by the AC, with a Reset Request message.
contents.zh-CHS: 图8提供了在运行状态下执行固件升级的WTP示例。这种固件升级模式允许WTP在继续提供服务的同时下载其映像。WTP将不会自动重置，直到AC发出重置请求消息通知。

The WTP opts to NOT download the firmware. The WTP resets upon receipt of a Reset Request message from the AC.
contents.zh-CHS: 图9提供了处于运行状态时固件下载的另一个示例。在此示例中，WTP在其非易失性存储器中已经具有AC指定的映像。WTP选择不下载固件。WTP在收到来自AC的重置请求消息后重置。
